src: re amogela ditsebišo go tšwa go batšweletšintšhi ba dijo mmogo le mabenkele a dijo tša gore ba gare ba tla ka maano a go thuša badiriši gore ba kgone go reka tše ntšhi ka tšhelete ya bona.
tgt: kwelethu icala, urhulumente uza kuqhubeka eyibeke esweni le meko ngeliso elibukhali kwaye uza kwenza konke okusemandleni akhe ukukhusela abemi bomzantsi afrika ekunyukeni ngokungazinzanga kweendleko zokuphila.

src: ka kgwedi ya hlakola ngwageng o, komišene ya phenkgišano e lokolotše mabaka ao e lego a dipotšišo mabapi le mmaraka wa dienywa le merogo gore setšhaba se fane ka ditshwayatshwayo go ona.
tgt: iqumrhu lomzantsi afrika kufuneka liqinisekise ukuba abathengi abahlawuleli kutya kakhulu kunokuba bekufuneka.

src: komišene e lemogile gape gore theko ya dienywa le merogo e be e le gare e hlatloga go feta le maemo a infoleišene, le gore se se bile le seabe se sebe go bahloki.
tgt: siyazamkela izibonakaliso ezivela kubavelisi bokutya kunye nabathengisi, ukuba babeka imilinganiselo yokunceda abathengi ukuba bafumane okungakumbi ngemali yabo.

src: dipotšišo di tla lekola ge eba go na le se sengwe seo se sa sepelego gabotse gomme se dirang gore dijo di bitše kudu bjalo.
tgt: kweyokwindla kulo nyaka ikomishoni yokhuphiswano ikhuphele uluntu ukuba luhlomle kwimiqathango yophando lwemarike ngemveliso entsha.

src: re tla šomiša pholisi ya rena ya tša phenkgišano go šireletša badiriši kgahlanong le ditlhatlogo tša ditheko ka ntle le lebaka gape le mekgwatšhomo ya go ba kgahlanong le phenkgišano, ya dikgwebo, bjale ka ge re dirile le nakong ya leuba la covid19.
tgt: iqaphele ukuba indleko yemveliso etsha yonyuka ngamanqanaba angaphezu kokunyuka kwamaxabiso, kwaye oku kube nefuthe elibi kakhulu kubantu abahluphekayo.

src: tšhomišompe ya mphiwafela wa bana ga e molaong more matshediso ge eba o tseba ka mphiwafela wa bana woo o amogelwago ke mohlokomedi wa gagwe gomme o šomišwa gampe, o na le maikarabelo a go bega taba yeo go ba south african social security agency (sassa).
tgt: ukusetyenziswa gwenxa kwesibonelelomali somntwana akukho semthethweni more matshediso ukuba uyazi ukuba isibonelelomali somntwana esifunyenwe ngulowo umgcinayo sisetyenzi swa gwenxa, unoxanduva lokuxela oko kwiarhente yezibonelelo zezentlalo nomhlalaphantsi yasemzantsi afrika (isassa).

src: go ya le ka seboleledi sa sassa, paseka letsatsi, mphiwafela wa bana o lefelwa mohlokomedi wa gagwe, efela maikemišetšo a wona ke go hlokomela ngwana.
tgt: ngokwengxelo ephuma kwisithethi sakwasassa upaseka letsatsi, isibonelelomali somntwana sihlawulwa kumntu omgcinayo, kodwa yenzelwe ukuba ijongane neemfuno zomntwana.

src: gabjale mphiwafela ke r480 ka kgwedi, ngwana o tee.
tgt: isibonelelomali okwangoku ngamar480 ngenyanga ngomntwana ngamnye.

src: mphiwafela wa bana o tsebagaditšwe ke mmušo gore o fe thekgo ya mašeleng go bana bao ba dulago ka malapeng ao a ihlokelago.
tgt: isibonelelomali sabantwa na saziswa ngurhulumente ukuze anikeze ngenkxasomali kubantwana abahlala kumakhaya angathathintweni.

src: "ge tšhomišompe e se no begwa, dinyakišišo di a dirwa.
tgt: "ukuba kukhe kwaxelwa nje ukusetyenziswa ngwenxa kwesibonelelomali, uphando luyenziwa.

src: ge dinyakišišo di ka humana gore tšhelete yeo e amogelwago ga e hole ngwana, sassa e ka kgetha motho yo mongwe go amogela le go laola mphiwafela woo legatong la ngwana," gwa realo letsatsi.
tgt: ukuba uphando lufumanise ukuba imali efunyenweyo ayimxhasi umntwana, abakwasassa bangachonga omnye umntu ukuba afumane kwaye alawule isibonelelomali egameni lomntwana lowo," utsho uletsatsi.

src: o tlaleletša ka gore go bohlokwa gore mohlokomedi wa ngwana, e lego yena a hlokomelago ngwana tšatši ka tšatši, e be moamogelatšhelete yoo a ngwadišitšwego.
tgt: wongeza ngelithi kuba lulekile ukuba umgcini oyintloko, ogcina umntwana imihla ngemihla, ibe nguye obhaliselwe ukufumana isibonelelomali.

src: "mo mabakeng ao e lego gore ngwana o tloga go mohlokomedi wa gagwe go ya go yo mongwe, mphiwafela o swanetše o latele ngwana mo a yago.
tgt: "kwimeko apho umntwana esuka komnye umngcini esiya komnye, isibonelelomali kufuneka sihambe no mntwana.

src: mohlokomedi wa ma thomo o letetšwe gore a begele ba sassa gore ngwana ga a sa le ka tlase ga tlhokomelo ya gagwe, gomme mohlokomedi yo moswa o swanetše a tle a tlo dira dikgopelo tša go amogela mphiwafela," letsa tsi a tlaleletša ka go realo.
tgt: kulindeleke ukuba lo mntu ebemgcina kuqala anike ingxelo kwasassa ukuba umntwana akasekho phantsi kwakhe, kwaye lo mntu mtsha uzakumgcina afake isicelo sesibonelelomali," wongeze ngelitshoyo uletsatsi.

src: letsatsi o re batho bao ba tšwelago pele go amogela mphiwafela wa ngwana morago ga ge ngwana a se sa le ka tlase ga tlhokomelo ya bona, ba tla swanelwa ke go lefela morago tšhelete yeo ba e amogetšego e se ka semolao.
tgt: uletsatsi uthi abantu abathe gqolo ukufumana isibonelelomali sabantwana emva kokuba abantwana bengasahlali nabo, kuzakufuneka ukuba bayibuyise imali abayifumene ngokungekho semthethweni.

src: ba ka ba ba yo sekišwa kgorong ya tsheko ge maikemišetšo a bona a go jabetša mmušo a ka netefatšwa.
tgt: basenokuba phantsi kwetyala lolwaphulo mthetho ukuba injongo yabo yokuqhatha urhulumente inokuqinisekiswa.

src: ditlamorago tše bjalo di ama gape le batho bao ba šomišago gampe mphiwafela wa go hlokomela batho bao ba hlokago go hlokomelwa – e lego mphiwafela woo o abjago ke sassa go fana ka thekgo ya tšhelete go bana bao ba golofetšego kudu gomme ba hloka go hlokomelwa nako tšohle, mphiwafela wa bagolofadi goba wa batšofadi.
tgt: iziphumo ezinjalo ziyasebenza nakubantu abasebenzisa gwenxa izibonelelo zoxhomekeko ezinikezwa yisassa ukunika isibonelelomali kubantwana abakhubazeke kakhulu abafuna ukhatha lelo olusisigxina, nakwi zibonelelo zokukhubazeka okanye izibonelelo zabantu abadala.

src: "ge eba tšhelete e šomišwa go reka bjala, diokobatši goba go kempola sebakeng sa go hlokomela motho yoo a e golelwago, tshepedišo ya go swana le yeo e hlalositšwego, ya go bega taba yeo, e tla latelwa," gwa realo letsatsi ke mang a ka dirago dikgopelo tša mphiwafela wa bana?
tgt: ukuba le mali isetyenziswa ekuthengeni utywala, iziyobisi okanye ukugembula, ingekuko ukuxhasa umntu lowo ufanele ukufumana isibonelelomali, kufuneka kulandelwe inkqubo enye yokuxela," utsho uletsatsi.

src: go ya ka letsatsi, modudi yo mongwe le yo mongwe wa saruri ka afrika borwa, modudi yoo a filwego madulo a saruri goba mofaladi yoo a ngwadišitšwego gomme a hlokomela ngwana, e ka ba ngwana e le wa gagwe wa madi goba e se wa gagwe wa madi, a ka dira dikgopelo tša mphiwafela wa bana, gomme a ka dira seo ge feela a fihlelela dinyakwa tšeo di hlaloswago ka mo tlase: ngwana le mohlokomedi ba swanetše ba dule ka afrika borwa saruri.
tgt: ngokutsho kukaletsatsi, nawuphi na ummi womzantsi afrika, umhlali osisigxina okanye imbacu ebhaliweyo ekhathalele umntwana, nokuba ngumntwana wakhe okanye ayingomntwana wakhe, angafaka isicelo sesibonelelomali somntwana, ukuba uhlangabezana nale migaqo idweliswe ngezantsi: umntwana kunye nomgcini wakhe kufuneka bahlale ngokusisigxina emzantsi afrika.

src: mohlokomedi o swanetše a be le me ngwaga e 16 (ge e le ka malapeng ao a hlokometšwego ke bana) goba go feta.
tgt: umgcini womntwana kufuneka abe neminyaka eli16 ubudala (kwimeko yamakhaya aphethwe nga bantwana) okanye ngaphezulu.

src: ngwana o swanetše a be ka tlase ga mengwaga e 18. moamogedi wa mphiwafela o swanetše a be mohlokomedi wa ngwa na wa tšatši ka tšatši gomme ebile ngwana o swanetše a dule le yena.
tgt: umntwana kufuneka abe ngaphantsi kwe18.

src: moamogedi o swanetše a fihlelele dinyakwa tša magomo a letseno.
tgt: umamkeli wesibonelelomali kufuneka abe ngoyena mntu uyintloko ogcine umntwana kwaye umntwana kufuneka ahlale naye.

src: ge eba mohlokomedi wa tšatši ka tšatši ga a nyala/nyalwa (ga sa ka a nyala/nyalwa, o hladile goba ke mohlolo/mohlologadi), letseno la gagwe ga se la swanela go feta r4 800 ka kgwedi.
tgt: umamkeli kufuneka ahla ngabezane neemfuno zovavanyo (uvavanyo lomvuzo).

src: naga ya rena e llela bafsa bao ba hlokofetšego thabeneng ya enyobeni vukuzenzele unnamed dibeke tše mmalwa tša go feta malapa a motsesetoropo wa scenery park ka ntle ga east london, ba amogetše ditaba tše bohloko tšeo go se nago motswadi yo a ka dumago go di amogela.
tgt: isizwe sethu sizilela ulutsha oluphulukene nobomi balo kwintlekele yethaveni yaseenyobeni vukuzenzele unnamed kwiiveki ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo iintsapho zelokishi yasescenery park ngaphandle kwasemonti, zifumene iindaba wonke umzali athandazela ukuba angaze azive.

src: ba boditšwe gore bana ba bona ba 21 ba hweditšwe ba hlokofetše, ka thabeneng.
tgt: baxelelwa ukuba abantwana babo abangama21 bafunyenwe bebhubhile, kwithaveni.

src: ngwana yo monnyane gare ga bona o be a na le mengwaga ye 13. dinyakišišo tša maphodisa mo tiragalong ye ya masetlapelo di tšwela pele ka lebelo.
tgt: oyena mntwana mncinane ebeneminyaka eli13 kuphela ubudala.

src: go latela dinyakišišo tša maphodisa, mmasepalamogolo wa buffalo city o lebeledišiša ge e le gore thabene yeo e tshetše melawana ya mmasepala.
tgt: uphando lwamapolisa ngale ntlekele luyaqhuba ngokukhawuleza.

src: re lla le go rapediša malapa ao a wetšwego ke mathata ao a palelwago ke go amogela masetlapelo a go šiiša namana tša mmele.
tgt: kuqhubekeko ngolu phando, umasipala ombaxa wase buffalo city uphanda ukuba ingaba ikhona na imigaqo kamasipala eyophulileyo le thaveni.

src: re reta mmušo wa selegae wa kapa bohlabela ka go thuša malapa ao a amegilego, gammogo le avbob yeo e ikannego go thuša malapa ka tša poloko.
tgt: iingcinga zethu kunye nemithandazo ikunye neentsapho ezisokolayo ukwamkela esi sehlo simanyumnyezi singathethekiyo.

src: le ge mekgatlo ya maleba e tshwela ka mare seo se diragetšego le go kgonthiša gore toka e a phethagala go batšwasehlabelo, go na le dipoledišano tšeo re di hlokago bjalo ka naga.
tgt: siyamncoma urhulumente wephondo lempuma koloni ngokuncedisa iintsapho ezichaphazelekileyo, kwakunye noavbob ozinikele ekuncediseni ezi ntsapho ngezingcwabo.

src: kgatišo le diswantšho tšeo di pharilwego inthaneteng tša seo se bitšwago moletlo wa ‘dipene fase’ mo lefelong leo bošegong bjoo di bontšha bafsa bao ba ketekago ba swere mabotlelo a bjala.
tgt: ngethuba abasemagunyeni abafanelekileyo behlabamahlongwane okwenzekileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ubulungisa ngakumaxhoba, kukho incoko ekufuneka sibe nayo njengelizwe.

src: bontši bja bao ba lego diswantšhong bo bonala e le ba ka fase ga mengwaga ye 18. bafsa ba mmalwa go tšwa scenery park ba boditše bobegaditaba gore ba bone kgatišo yeo e thethago mo bobegaditabeng bja leago, e tshepiša bjala bja go se lefelwe go batho ka moka bao ba tlilego moletlong bošegong bjoo.
tgt: ingxaki yokusela kwabantwana abangaphantsi kweminyaka efanelekileyo ngokomthetho.

src: koketšego ya bafsa ba bantši bao ba nwago bjala e thoma go ba bothata bjo bogolo ka mo nageng moo bontši bja batho bao ba nwago bjala ba šetšego ba hlathwa ke mokgatlo wa maphelo wa lefase go ba makgoba a bjala.
tgt: imifanekiso kamabonakude kunye nakwiintanethi yetheko elibizwa ngokuba ‘yipens down’ elalikula ndawo ngoba busuku ibonisa ulutsha olonwabileyo lubambe iibhotile zotywala.

src: tšhomišo ya bjala go bamahlalagading e amanywa le maemo ao a gwahlafetšego a bokgoni, go se iphe nako ya go ithuta, dikgobalo tšeo di lebanego le go nwa bjala, dikgopolo tša go ipolaya le go leka go ipolaya, le maitshwaro a kotsi.
tgt: uninzi lwalo kule mifanekiso lukhangeleka ngathi lusekwiminyaka yolutsha.

src: re swanetše go kopana go fenya maitshwaro a a mabe ao a tšeelago bafsa ba rena mengwaga ye mekaone go feta ka moka ya maphelo a bona, le go ba bea kotsing ya go ba makgoba a bjala.
tgt: iqela labantu abatsha abasuka escenery park lixelele amajelo eendaba ukuba libone isaziso esisasazwa kumajelo eendaba zoluntu, esinikezela ngemijikelo yotywala basimahla kubo bonke abantu abebezimase umsitho ngoba busuku.

src: bjalo ka malapa seo se ra gore re swanetše go boledišana ka go lokologa ka bjala gomme re beye mellwane ya go nwa bjala ga bafsa.
tgt: ukwamkeleka okwandileyo kwentlalo yabantu abatsha abasela utywala kuyingxaki enkulu kwilizwe apho uninzi lwabantu abaselayo sele behlelwe ngumbutho wezempilo wehlabathi njengabasela kakhulu.

src: go nwa bjala ga bana ba mengwaga ya ka fase ga 18 go kgahlanong le molao.
tgt: ukuselwa kotywala phakathi kolutsha olufikisayo koyanyaniswa nokungasebenzi kakuhle, ukungahambi isikolo kakuhle, ukwenzakala okunxulumene notywala, iingcinga kunye neenzame zokuzibulala, kunye nokuziphatha ngokusemngciphekweni.

src: bjalo ka batho ba bagolo re swanetše go efoga mekgwa ya go roma bana go re rekela bjala goba go dumela ge bafsa ba kgopela gore re ba rekele bjala.
tgt: kufuneka sidibane silwe lo mkhwa uphanga ulutsha lwethu eyona minyaka igqwesileyo yobomi balo, ubenza babe sesichengeni sokuzenza amakhoboka otywala.

src: ga se la mathomo re lebana le masetlapelo a go swana le ao a diragetšego scenery park.
tgt: njengeentsapho, kuthetha ukuba neencoko ezivulekileyo neziphandle malunga notywala nokubeka imilinganiselo.

src: tša go swana le tše di diragetšego thabeneng ya enyobeni, di diragetše gape le naeteklabong ya throb ka durban ka ngwaga wa 2000, gape le ka thabeneng ya osi ka khayelitsha ka ngwaga wa 2015, ke gore dikgwebo tše ka moka di be di rekišetša bana ba ka fase ga mengwaga ye 18 bjala.
tgt: into yabantwana abangaphantsi kweminyaka eli18 abasela utywala ichasene nomthetho.

src: koketšego ya dikgwebo tšeo di tshelago molao ka boomo e bontšha go palelwa ga mmušo go phethagatša melawana.
tgt: njengabantu abadala, kufuneka sizikhwebule kwimikhwa efana nokuthuma abantwana abasebancinane ukuba basithengele utywala okanye ukuvuma izicelo zokuthengela olu lutsha utywala.

src: ka fase ga molao wa bjala wa setšhaba, beng ba dikgwebo tšeo di nago le laesense ba ka se rekišetše mang goba mang wa ka fase ga mengwaga ye 18 bjala.
tgt: asikokokuqala ngqa sijongana neziganeko ezimbi ezifana nesenzeke escenery park kwiveki ephelileyo.

src: ba swanetše gape go tšea magato a go kwagala go kgonthiša gore mang goba mang yo ba mo rekišetšago bjala o na le mengwaga ya maleba ya go ka reka.
tgt: into efanayo phakathi kwethaveni yaseenyobeni, intlekele yeklabhu yasebusuku ithrob ethekwini ngowama2000, kunye nentlekele yethaveni iosi ekhayelitsha ngowama 2015, kukuba la maziko ayethengisela abantwana abasebancinane utywala.

src: re ipiletša go ditšhaba ka moka go šoma le mmušo go kgonthiša gore dithabene, dišebini, mafelo a boithabišo le mabenkele ao a tshelago molao gore ba lebana le letsogo la molao.
tgt: ukwanda kwamaziko atyeshela ngokuphandle umthetho kubonakalisa ukusilela kwabasemagunyeni ekunyanzelisa imigaqo.

src: re ipiletša go maphodisa a rena go tiiša letsogo mo go phethagatšeng melao yeo e thibelago thekišo ya bjala kgauswi le dikolo le go kaonafatša tekolo ya mabenkele go kgonthiša gore bjala ga bo rekišetšwe bana ba ka fase ga mengwaga ye 18. ke nnete gore bjala ke mokgwa wa go ithabiša go bafsa mo ditšhabeng tšeo di se nago mafelo a boithabišo a mantši ao a lekanego mengwaga ya bona.
tgt: phantsi komthetho wo tywala wesizwe, abanini bamaziko anamaphephamvume okuthengisa utywala abanakuthengisela nabani na ongaphantsi kweminyaka eli18 utywala.

src: setšhaba sa scenery park se boletše ka go hloka dipapadi, mafelo a go ithuta le ao bafsa ba ka ithabišago gona, seo se dira gore ba ye dithabeneng.
tgt: sihlaba ikhwelo kuluntu ukuba lusebenzisane nabasemagunyeni ukuqinisekisa ukuba iithaveni, iishibhini, iindawo zolonwabo kunye neendawo ezophula umthetho zijongana neziphumo zoko.

src: ka morago ga tirigalo ye ya masetlapelo, setšhaba se bontšhitše gore ga go na mabala a dipapadi a maleba, makgobapuku a setšhaba goba disenthara tša bafsa ka scenery park.
tgt: sihlaba ikhwelo kumapolisa ethu ukuba aqinise ukunyanzeliswa kwemithetho ethintela ukuthengiswa kotywala kufutshane nezikolo kwaye aqinise uhlolo lweendawo ezithengisa utywala ukuqinisekisa ukuba utywala abuthengiselwa abantwana abasebancinane.

src: bjalo ka mmušo wa bosetšhaba, wa profense le wa selegae re swanela ke go arabela go maipiletšo a ditšhaba tše le a ditšhaba tše dingwe ka go aga mafelo a boithabišo a mantši, dinolofatši, mananeo, diprotšeke tša bafsa ba rena mo dileteng tšeo go se nago hlabologo mo profenseng yeo.
tgt: enye into eyinyani kukuba utywala yindlela yolutsha yokubaleka kwiindawo zokuhlala apho amathuba olonwabo olukhuselekileyo nolulungele ubudala beminyaka embalwa.

src: mekgatlo ye mengwe ya leago go swana le dikgwebo le yona e swanetše go thuša ka thekgo ya mašeleng.
tgt: uluntu lwasescenery park luveze ukunqongophala kwemidlalo, ukufunda kunye nezinye izibonelelo zophuhliso kulutsha, nto leyo ebangele ukuba lubhenele ekuzulazuleni kwiithaveni.

src: bjale ka ditšhaba re swanetše go šoma le diforamo tša maphodisa tša setšhaba, le mekgatlo ya rena ya leago le makgotlataolo a rena a dikolo gomme re kgathe tema ye kgolo mo maphelong a bana ba rena le go kgonthiša polokego ya bona le go phela gabotse.
tgt: emva kwesi sihelegu, uluntu luveze ukuba akukho mabala emidlalo asebenzayo, amathala eencwadi oluntu okanye amaziko olutsha escenery park.

src: monkeypox ka nageng ya afrika borwa vukuzenezele unnamed tona ya maphelo ngaka joe phaahla o kgonthišitše gore monkeypox e utollotšwe ka afrika borwa nakong ya kopano le bobegaditaba ka pretoria, gauteng.
tgt: imonkeypox emzantsi afrika vukuzenele unnamed ezempilo umphathiswa wezempilo ugqirha joe phaahla uqinisekisile ukuba imonkeypox iye yafunyanwa emzantsi afrika ngethuba ebethetha noonondaba kutshanje epitoli, egauteng.

src: o re o amogetše pego go tšwa go ditirelo tša laporotori ya maphelo a setšhaba (nhls) gore ba kgonthišitše gore go na le monkeypox ka afrika borwa ka diteko tša laporotori.
tgt: uthe uye wafumana ingxelo evela kwiinkonzo zesizwe zelabhoretri yezempilo (inhls) yokuba baye bayiqinisekisa imonkeypox emzantsi afrika ngeemvavanyo zaselabhoretri.

src: baerase e utollotšwe ka gauteng le kapa bohlabela.
tgt: le ntsholongwane ifunyaniswe/ibhaqwe egauteng nasentshona koloni.

src: monkeypox gantši ke bolwetši bja go se be šoro kudu bjoo bo bakago dintho goba dišo mo mmeleng.
tgt: imonkeypox idla ngokuba sisifo esingenabuzaza esibonakala njengamadyungudyungu okanye izilonda ezisesi khumbeni.

src: gantši ga bo šoro gomme mahu a gona e ka ba 1%.
tgt: idla ngokungabi nabubuzaza kwaye inezinga lokufa lesinye ekhulwini.

src: nakong ya go feta bolwetši bjo bo ile bja begwa ka dinageng tša afrika tša go swana le nigeria, democratic republic of the congo, central african republic le ghana mo mathomong a bo 2000. dipalo tša godimo tša go phulega gonabjale di go la yuropa gomme uk ke yona e di etilego pele moo batho bao ba fetetšwego e lego ba 700, gomme ba spain bona ba ka godimo ga 500, ya latelwa ke germany, portu gal le france.
tgt: esi sifo besikhe sachazwa kumazwe aseafrika afana nenigeria, idemocratic republic of the congo, icentral african republic kunye neghana ekuqaleni kweminyaka yoo2000.

src: tona o bolela gore institute ya setšhaba ya malwetši a go fetela (nicd) e dira tlhahlo ya mošomong ya inthanete go bašomi ba maphelo gore ba kgone go lemoga bolwetši gore go kgonwe go dirwa diteko tša laporotori tšeo di hlokegago.
tgt: uqhambuko lwangoku lulawulwa ngamanani aphezulu eyurophu kwaye iuk ikhokela ngeziganeko zesifo ezingaphezulu kwama700, ispain inezingaphezulu kwama500, zilandelwa yijamani, iportugal kunye nefransi.

src: "bolwetši bjo bo phatlalala fela ka go kgomana, ka gona o ka se bo hwetše ka go ba ka phapošing ye tee le motho yo a fetetšwego."
tgt: umphathiswa uthe iziko lesizwe lezifo ezosulelayo (inicd) liqeqesha abasebenzi bezempilo kwiintanethi ukuze bakwazi ukusibhaqa esi sifo ukuze kwenziwe iimvavanyo zaselabhoretri eziyimfu neko.

src: tona phaahla o kgonthišeditše maafrika borwa gore monkeypox ga se baerase ye mpsha yeo e sa tsebjego gomme boramahlale ba na le tsebo ka ga yona.
tgt: "esi sifo sisasazeka kuphela ngokudibana ngokusondeleleneyo, ngoko ke awukwazi ukusifumana ngokuba kwigumbi elinye nomntu owosulelekileyo," utshilo umphathiswa.

src: modulasetulo wa komiti ya dikeletšo ya ditona (mac) ka ga covid19 yoo gape e lego leloko la taolo la nhls, profesa koleka mlisana, o re monkeypox ke bolwetši bjoo bo tlwaelegilego ka dikarolong tša gare le leboa la afrika bjoo bo tsebegago ka go se be šoro.
tgt: umphathiswa uphaahla uqinisekise abemi bo mzantsi afrika ukuba imonkeypox ayiyontsholongwane engazange ibonwe ngaphambili kwaye iinzululwazi zino lwazi ngayo.

src: ka bolwetši bjoo bo tlwaelegilego go bolelwa ka bolwetši bjoo gantši bo hwetšwago go batho bao ba itšego goba lefelong leo le itšego.
tgt: usihlalo wekomiti yeengcebiso yabapha thiswa (imac) kwicovid19 kunye nelungu lesigqeba senhls, unji ngalwazi ukoleka mlisana, uthe imonkeypox sisifo esigqugqisayo ku mbindi nakumntla afrika esaziwa ngokungabi nabuzaza.

src: o re bolwetši bja monkeypox bo nyakile go swana le bja sekobonyana.
tgt: isifo esigqugqisayo yimeko esoloko ikho phakathi kwabantu abathile okanye kwindawo ethile.

src: "go na le meento le dihlare go alafa monkeypox.
tgt: uthe kukho ukufana phakathi kwemonkeypox kunye nesmallpox.

src: bolwetši bjo bo tšwelela ka maswao a go swana le a mpshikela le a bolwetši bja legionnaires.
tgt: "akhona amayeza okugonya kunye nonya ngo lwemonkeypox.

src: selo se bohlokwa ke gore motho yo mongwe yo mongwe yo a nago le maswao go bonolo go mo phekola gomme sa bohlokwa kudu le go feta ke gore ga e fetelane fela fela, ga e swane le baerase ya malwetši a go hema, ka gore yona e fetela ka go kgo mana.
tgt: esi sifo sizibonakalisa ngeempawu ezifana nomkhuhlane kunye nelegionnaires (uhlobo oluqatha lwenyumoniya okanye ukudumba kwemiphunga okudla ngokubangelwa lusu leleko).

src: e tla go fetela ge fela o kgomana thwii le motho yoo a fetetšwego," a realo.
tgt: into ebalulekileyo kukuba umntu onenkcazelo kagqirha esekelwe kwiimpawu kulula ukumxilonga kwaye okona kubaluleke kakhu lu kukuba kunzima ukusidlulisela kwabanye abantu, asifani nentsholongwane yokuphefumla, kuba yosuleleka ngokudibana.

src: re swanetše go dira se sengwe gonabjale re le mmogo go fediša dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi vukuzenzele unnamed re thoma kgwedi ya basadi ka masetla pelo.
tgt: ngoku kufuneka sithathe amanyathelo sikunye ukuze siphelise ubundlobongela obujoliswe kwabasetyhini vukuzenzele unnamed ibe sisiqalo esibi kwi nyanga yabasetyhini.

src: re sa lebane gape le lehla kore leo le sa kgahlišego la setšhaba sa rena.
tgt: siphinde sakhunju zwa ngenkohlakalo embi egqubayo kwisizwe sakuthi.

src: mo kgweding ye e fetilego, sehlopha sa banna le basadi seo se bego se gatiša bidio ya mmino ka moepong wo o bego o sa hlwe o šomišwa kgauswi le krugersdorp se ile sa hlaselwa ke bahlasedi bao ba bego ba itlhamile bao ba ilego ba kata ka bontši basadi ba seswai.
tgt: kwinyanga ephelileyo, iqela lamadoda nabasetyhini ababefota ividiyo yomculo kumgodi ongasasetyenziswayo kufutshane nekrugersdorp baye bahlaselwa nga bahlaseli abaxhobileyo abathi badlwengula aba basetyhini abasibhozo.

src: ditiro tše šoro tše ke go tshela ditokelo tša basadi le basetsana gore ba dule le go šoma ka tokologo le ka polokego.
tgt: ezi zenzo zoyikekayo zenkohlakalo ziyindelelo kwilungelo labasetyhini nakumantombazana ukuba bahlale kwaye basebenze ngokukhululekileyo nango kukhuselekileyo.

src: le ge e le gore ba nyakana le bagononelwa ba ditiro tše, tirelo ya maphodisa ya afrika borwa le yona e swanetše go lebiša šedi ya ka pela go dingongorego tša setšhaba sa ka west village, fao tiragalo ye e diragetšego gona, seo se bolelago gore se hlaselwa ke digongwana tšeo di itlhamilego fao lefelong leo.
tgt: ngelixa belandela abarhanelwa kolu lwa phulomthetho, inkonzo yamapolisa omzantsi afrika kufuneka inike ingqwalasela ngoko nangoko kwiinkxalabo zabahlali basewest village, apho kwenzeke khona esi sehlo, abathi bangcungcu thekiswe ngamaqela emi gulukudu exhobileyo kulo mmandla.

src: bao ba katago ga go na le fao re ba beilego gona setšhabeng sa rena.
tgt: abadlwenguli abafane langa kuhlala nabantu.

src: re ipiletša go ditšhaba gore di šomišane le maphodisa go netefatša gore basenyi ba ba a golegwa le go sekišwa.
tgt: sihlaba ikhwelo kuluntu ukuba lusebenzisane namapolisa ukuqinisekisa ukuba aba baphulimthetho bayabanjwa kwaye batshu tshiswe.

src: ditšhaba tša rena ga se tša swanela go dula le disenyi ka malapeng a bona.
tgt: abantu bakuthi akufuneki bakhusele abaphulimthetho abahlala phakathi kwabo.

src: ka mehla go na le motho ditšhabeng tša rena yo a tsebago se sengwe ka seo se diragetšego, yo a kwelego se sengwe ka seo se diragetšego goba yo a tlogago a bone se sengwe ka seo se diragetšego.
tgt: kuhlala kukho umntu owaziyo into kwiindawo zethu, oyivileyo into okanye okhe wayibona into ethile.

src: bothata ke gore ba bantši ba rena ba kgetha go homola ka gobane mosenyi e le mogwera wa bona, e le molekane goba mošomimmogo.
tgt: ingxaki kukuba uninzi lwethu lukhetha ukuthula kuba umenzi wobubi engumhlobo, eli qabane okanye engumntu osebenza naye.

src: goba re no tšhoga fela le go tšhoga go ba batšwasehlabelo.
tgt: okanye soyika nje ukwenziwa amaxhoba.

src: go bohlokwa go gopola gore dipego tša bosenyi ka moka tšeo di hwetšwago ke lekala la boikgokaganyo la thibelo ya bosenyi boitshupo bja batho bao ba bo begago bo ka se utollwe.
tgt: kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuba zonke iinkcukacha eziyimfihlo ezifunyenwe liziko loqha gamshelwano lesaps crime stop ziphathwa ngemfihlo.

src: ke ipiletša go yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo a nago le tshedimošo ka ga bosenyi bjo gore ba bo bege go maphodisa gore basenyi bao ba golegwe.
tgt: ndihlaba ikhwelo kuye nabani na onolwazi ngolu lwaphulomthetho ukuba axele kwabasemagunyeni ukuze babanjwe abenzi bobubi.

src: ka lebaka la bogolo bja bothata bjo ka nageng ya rena, ga go sa kgonagala go efoga boikarabelo bja go bega bosenyi bja tša thoba lano.
tgt: xa kujongwa ubungaka nani bale ngxaki kwilizwe lethu, akusekho ukuphepha uxanduva lokuxela izenzo zolwaphulomthetho lokwabelana ngesondo.

src: go ya ka karolo ya molao wo mompsha wo o setšego o thomile go šoma, kamoka le go ya ka tlamego ya rena ya maitshwaro, ka moka ga rena bjale re na le maika rabelo a semolao go bega bosenyi maphodiseng ge re tseba ka bona, ge re na le mabaka a go kwagala a go gononela gore bo gona goba ge re belaela gore molato wa tša thobalano o dirilwe kgahlanong le motho yo a sa kgonego go ikemela.
tgt: ngokomthetho omtsha okhoyo ngoku sonke sinoxanduva ngoko mthetho, ukongeza kweli lokuvakalelwa kwethu njengabantu, lokuchaza kwabasemagunyeni xa sinolwazi, urhano okanye sikrokrela ukuba ityala lokuxhatshazwa ngo kwesondo olenziwe kumntu osesichengeni.

src: go se bege molato woo wa tša thobalano bjale e setše e le selo se se bonwago bjalo ka molato wa bosenyi.
tgt: ngoku kukwaphulo umthetho ukungaxeli kwabasemagunyeni ityala lokuxhatshazwa ngokwe sondo komnye umntu.

src: ye ke karolo ya molao o tee go ye meraro yeo ke e saennego pejana mo ngwa geng wo ye e maatlafatšago ntwa kgahlanong le di kgaruru tša bong ebile e fa thekgo le tšhireletšo go batšwasehlabelo.
tgt: lo mthetho uyinxalenye yeminye emithathu endithe ndayityikitya ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka eqinisa idabi lokulwa ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kwaye unika inkxaso nokhuseleko olukhulu kumaxhoba.

src: gareng ga tše dingwe, melao ye e katološa bogolo bja retšistara ya bosetšhaba ya basenyi ba tša thobalano, ya maatlafatša tshepedišo ya go lekola se ka šedi ge e le gore batho bao ba batlago mošomo ga ba na melato, le go tsebagatša melato ye mengwe ye meswa ya basenyi ba tša thobalano.
tgt: phakathi kwezinye izinto, imithetho yandisa umda werejista yesizwe yabaphulimthetho bokuxhaphaza nge sondo, yomeleza inkqubo yokuhlola, kwaye yazisa iindidi ezongezelelweyo zamatyala okuxhaphaza ngokwesondo.

src: ditshepedišo di gare go tsenya melao ye tirišong.
tgt: iinkqubo ziyaqhubeka ukuze le mithetho isebenze.

src: tšona di akaretša go hlahla basekiši le bomaseterata, go fa ditaelo tša mabapi le peila go bahlankedi ka moka ba saps, le go ngwala leswa matlakala a dipharomelato gore a akaretše melato ye meswa ye e hlamilwego.
tgt: oku kuquka uqeqesho lwabatshutshisi kunye noomantyi, ukukhutshwa kwemiyalelo ngebheyile kuwo onke amagosa esaps, nokuhlaziya amaphepha okubeka ityala ukuze aquke nezi ntlobo zintsha zamatyala.

src: re ikemišeditše gore metheo ye ka moka e tsenywe tirišong gore bahlankedi ba rena ba phethagatšo ya molao le dikgorotsheko di kgone go nyakišiša le go sekiša ditiro tša dikgaruru tša bong gabotse.
tgt: sizimisele ukuba zonke ezintsika zibekhona ukuze iiarhente zeli zogcinomthetho kunye neenkundla zibenokuphanda kwaye zitshutshise ngempumelelo enkulu ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini.

src: dikgaruru tša bong le polao ya basadi ke bothata bjo bo tšwilego taolong setšhabeng bjo bo ikepetšego ka medu.
tgt: ubundlobongela obu sekelwe kwisini kunye nokubulawa kwabasetyhini yingxaki enzulu yentlalo.

src: ga se gwa lekana gore badirabosenyi ba golegwe, ba sekišwe, ba bonwe molato le go romelwa kgolegong.
tgt: akwanelanga ukuba abenzi bobubi babanjwe, balaliswe eziseleni, bafu nyaniswe benetyaka baze bagwetywe.

src: re swanetše go šoma mmogo go rarolla dilo tše di hlohleletšago dkgaruru tša bong ka ditšhabeng tša rena, go akaretšwa maitshwaro le ditiro tša kgatelelo ya basadi tšeo di dirwago ke banna.
tgt: kufuneka sisebenzisane ukulwa ezi zinto ziphe mbelela ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kwii ndawo esihlala kuzo, kuquka iingcinga kunye nezenzo ezikhokelisa phambili iimfuno zama doda.

src: go fediša dikgaruru tša bong go nyaka gore re šomišaneng mmogo bjalo ka batho.
tgt: ukuphelisa ubundlobo ngela obusekelwe kwisini kufuna ukuba sisebenze kunye njengabantu.

src: dibaka tša go hwetša pasari go bafsa kgaogelo letsebe sonia malinga (23) go tšwa piet retief ka mpumalanga o bolela gore go ba moa mogedi wa pasari ya khamphani ya shoprite go netefaditše gore a be le bokamoso bjo bo tshepišago.
tgt: amathuba enkxasomali yemfundo kubantu abatsha kgaogelo letsebe usonia malinga (23) wasepiet retief empu malanga uthi ukubangu mxhamli wenkxasomali yemfundo yakwashopri te group kuqinisekise ikamva eliqaqambileyo kuyeumalinga wafumana inkxasomali yemfundo kumthengisi wasemza ntsi afrika ngowama 2018. wafaka isicelo senkxasomali yemfundo emva kokugqiba amaba nga esikolo esiphakami leyo ehoërskool piet retief.

src: malinga o hweditše pa sari go tšwa kgwebong ye kgolo ya ka afrika borwa ka 2018. o dirile dikgope lo tša pasari ka morago ga go pheta dithuto tša sekolo seo se phagamego ka hoërskool piet retief.
tgt: "ekukhuleni kwam, ndandifuna ukuba ngugqirha, kodwa kamva ndaqalisa ukuhlola ezi nye iindlela.

src: "ge ke gola, mathomong ke be ke nyaka go ba ngaka, eupša ka mora gonyana ke ile ka thoma go lekola dikgetho tše dingwe tša mošomo.
tgt: ndifunde malunga nokulandelelana kweenkqubo ezibanda kanyekayo ekuvelisweni nasekuhanjisweni kwe mpahla yorhwebo kwaye ndaphantse ndatsaleleka ngoko nangoko kuyo.

src: ke ile ka bala ka mešomo ya bolaodi bja theko ya diphahlo le kabo ya ditirelo le ya bolaodi bja go sepediša diphahlo gomme ka ona motsotso o ke ile ka ikwa ke rata kudu lekala le.
tgt: ndikhumbula ukuba ndandidla ngokuhlala ndibukele iilori zingena ziphuma kwidolophu yasekhaya kwaye ndi zibuza ukuba ngubani owayeqinisekisa ukuba umgangatho kunye nobu ninzi beempahla zicha nekile kwanokuba zifika kwindawo yokuhanjiswa echanekileyo kusini na.

src: ke fao ke ilego ka hwetša lerato la ka gona mabapi le lekala le," gwa bolela malinga.
tgt: kulapho ndafumana khona uthando lwam," utshilo umalinga.

src: malinga o hweditše kgrata ya bcom onase dithutong tša bolaodi bja go sepetša diphahlo ka yunibesithing ya joha nnesburg gomme a thoma mošomo wa gagwe ka shoprite bjalo ka mošomi yo a hlahlwago ka tša bolaodi bja lefelo la go sepetša diphahlo ka hlakola 2021. mo nakong ye e sa tšwago go feta o ile a hlatlošetšwa go ba mosekaseki wa theko ya diphahlo tša lebenkele.
tgt: umalinga ufumene isidanga sebcom ho nours kwilogistics ma nagement kwiyunivesithi yasejohannesburg waza waqala umsebenzi wakhe kwashoprite njengoma nejala oqeqeshwayo kwi ziko lokuhanjiswa kwe mpahla kweyomdumba wama2021.

src: go ba karolo ya kha mphani ya shoprite go okeditše tsebo ya malinga ka intasteri ya dikgwebo tša go rekiša.
tgt: kutshanje uye wanyuselwa ukuba abe ngumhlalutyi wola wulo nohanjiso lwarhoqo lwempahla.

src: "go nthutile tše ntši le go feta ka ga bolaodi bja go sepetša diphahlo ebile go nthušitše gore ke kgone go tšwela pele go kgoboketša mabokgoni a ka le go gola mo mošomong wa ka," a realo.
tgt: ukuba yinxalenye yeshoprite group kulwenze banzi ulwazi lukamali nga ngeshishini loku thengisa.

src: ka fao o ka dirago dikgopelodikgopelo tša lenaneo le la pasari la khamphani ya shoprite leo le akaretšago bohle le buletšwe dikgo pelo tša ngwaga wa dithuto wa 2023. pasari ye e e thoma ka r45 000 go fihla ka r70 000 ka ngwa ga, go lebeletšwe lefapha la dithuto le sehlongwa sa dithuto seo moithuti a tlogo ithuta go sona.
tgt: "kundifundise nangakumbi ngolawulo lokuhanjiswa kwempahla kwaye kundenze ukuba ndiqhubeke ndiphuhlisa izakhono zam kwaye ndi qhubele phambili nomse benzi wam," utshilo.

src: dijo tša go hlohleletšwa ke isizulu di dirile gore resturente ya motsekapa e tume owen mngadi ka go laetša boikgantšho bja bohwa bja gagwe ka dijo tša setšo, mongresturente mmabatho molefe wa go tšwa emazulwini o dirile gore resturente ya gagwe e tume kudu morago ga gore e akaretšwe lenaneong la diresturente tše kaonekaone lefaseng la go bitšwa 50 next.
tgt: ukutya kwesizulu kubeke indawo yokutyela yasekapa emephini owen mngadi ngokubonakalisa ukuzingca ngelifa lakhe ngokutya kwesintu, umpheki ummabatho molefe ubeke ivenkile yakhe yokutyela, iemazulwini, kwimephu yehlabathi emva kokuba ibandakanyiwe kuluhlu lwe50 next.

src: lenaneo le le hlagiša ka tatelano maina a 50 a baapei bao ba kgahlišago kudu lefaseng, bao ba nago le bokgoni bja gore ka tšatši le lengwe ba ka hlagelela lenaneong la mabonwa la diresturente tše 50 tše kaonekaone lefaseng.
tgt: olu luhlu lunika amagama angama50 abona bapheki abanikisa umdla kakhulu kwihlabathi, nabanakho ukuba ngenye imini babe kuluhlu oludumileyo lwehlabathi lweendawo zokutyela ezingama50 ezigqwesileyo.

src: molefe (27) o thomile resturente ya gagwe ya sebjalebjale ya isizulu gola motsekapa kua e v&a waterfront mo karolong ya bao ba ithomelago dikgwebo ka 2020, morago ga gore a lahlegelwe ke mošomo wa gagwe intastering ya diresturente ka baka la leuba covid19.
tgt: umolefe (27) usungule indawo yakhe yokutyela yale mihla yesizulu ekapa ev&a waterfront’s makers landing ngo2020, emva kokuba ephulukene nomsebenzi wakhe ngenxa yecovid19 kwishishini lokutyela.

src: o bolela gore boapei bja gagwe bo hlohleleditšwe ke ka fao a godišitšwego ka gona gola kwazulunatal fao kokoagwe a bego a apea dijo tša setšo.
tgt: uthi ukutya kwakhe kukhuthazwe kukukhulela kwakhe kwazulunatal apho umakhulu wakhe wayebaphekela khona ukutya kwesintu.

src: o dumela gore se se mo tšwetše mohola le go mo thuša gore a phale ba bangwe phadišanong ya go bitšwa 50 next.
tgt: ukholelwa ukuba oku kumsebenzele kwaye kwamnceda ukuba agqame kakhulu kunabanye kolu khuphiswano lwe50 next.

src: molefe o bolela gore emazulwini, yeo phetolelo ya yona e lego ‘magodimo’, e gokagokeditše kgahlego go tšwa go maafrika borwa le baeti ba boditšhabatšhaba bao ba ikemišeditšego go kwa tatso ya dijo tša gagwe tša go hlohleletšwa ke isizulu.
tgt: umolefe uthi iemazulwini, itsale umdla kubemi bomzantsi afrika kunye nakubatyeleli bamazwe ngamazwe abanomdla wokungcamla ukutya kwakhe okukhuthazwe sisintu samazulu.

src: karolo ya bao ba ithomelago dikgwebo, e lego hapo ya dijo tša ka mo afrika borwa le setšo, ke lefelo le kaonekaone la gagwe, a realo.
tgt: imakers landing, liziko lokutya kunye nenkcubeko yasemzantsi afrika, yeyona ndawo ifanelekileyo kuye, uqhubeke watsho.

src: emazulwini e fana ka menu wa sesola sa dintsanatsana tše šupa, wo o fetogafetogang sehla se sengwe le se sengwe.
tgt: iemazulwini inemenyu equlathe ukutya okusixhenxe, netshintshayo qho kutshintsha ixesha lonyaka.

src: dijo tša molefe di solwa ka bothakga, ebile di akaretša le disola tša isijingi – bogobe bja go dirwa ka lephotse, lephotse la go bešwa, lebebe la go kgahla la go dirwa ka diperekisi le potloro; isibindi nechakalaka – sebete sa kgomo sa go gatikwa ka potloro, chakalaka ya digwere tše serolwane le moro wa eie; le iqanda, isibindi noshatini – motswako wa setšhuuse gadikilwego, dibete tšakgogo mogwapa wa gotlotšwa ka borobjwe bja lee.
tgt: ukutya kukamolefe kuphakwa kakuhle kakhulu, kuquka ukutya okufana nesijingi – isidudu sethanga, ithanga eligcadiweyo, ijeli yepesika kunye neayisikrimu yebhotolo emdaka; isibindi nechakalaka – isibindi senkomo esifakwe ibhotolo, ilentile etyheli nechakalaka kunye nomhluzi wetswele; kunye neqanda, isibindi noshatini – itartlet enetumata eyojiweyo, isibindi senkukhu kunye nekhrimu yeqanda enomqwayito.

src: "ge o fihla motsekapa, o ka direga gore o se bone taetšo ya makgonthe ya gore afrika borwa e mabapi le eng, ke ka fao ke tšeerego sephetho sa go dira se maleba ka dijo tša setšo le go laetša baeti tšeo re di jago.
tgt: "xa ufika ekapa, usenokungafumani mbonakalo yokwenyani yokuba umzantsi afrika ulilizwe elinjani, ngoko ke ndiye ndagqiba kwelokuba ndihlale ndinyanisekile kum ngokokutya kwesintu ndibonise abakhenkethi izinto esizityayo.

src: ke ipotša tšatši ka tšatši ge ke anegela batho ka leeto laka; ke ba botša ka tlhathollo yaka ya gore dijo tša isizulu ke dife.
tgt: ndiye ndizixelela qho kusasa ukuba ndibalisa ibali lam; kunye nendlela endikwazi ngayo ukutya kwesizulu.

src: ke holofela gore batho ba tlo di thabela go ya le ka fao di lego ka gona.
tgt: ndiyathemba ukuba abantu bakwamkela ngehlobo okululo.

src: re nale tshepho ya go hlatloša disola tša se tlwaedi go ba tša maemo a godimodimo.
tgt: sinethemba lokuphakamisa ukutya okuqhelekileyo sikwenze okugqwesileyo.

src: motsekapa o nale batho ba ditšo tša go fapafapana, ntle le baeti ba boditšhabatšhaba; ka moka ba tla ithuta ka dijo tša isizulu,’’ a realo.
tgt: ikapa linabemi abohlukeneyo, ngaphandle kwabakhenkethi bamazwe ngamazwe; bonke baye bafunde ngokutya kwesizulu," utshilo umolefe.

src: diresturente tše 50 tše kaonekaone lefasenge be e le mokgwa wa molefe wa go tumiša dijo tša setšo ka sebjalebjale wo o mo dirilego gore a ikhweletše sekgoba lenaneong la 50 next, leo ngwaga ka ngwaga le ketekago batho ba 50 ba mengwaga ya ka fase ga ye 35 bao ba fetošago seemo sa legoro la dijo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt: iindawo zokutyela ezingama50 eziphuma phambili kwihlabathi ibiyindlela kamolefe yokwenza ukutya kwesintu kube kokwangoku nokuthe kwamnika indawo kuluhlu lwe50 next , noluthi qho ngonyaka lubhiyoze abantu abangama50 abangaphantsi kweminyaka engama35 nabathi babe nefuthe kwezokutya kwihlabathi liphela.

src: phadišano ye e kgontšha baapei ba bohlale kudu go laetša lefase mabokgoni a bona a go apea.
tgt: olu khuphiswano lwenza ukuba aba bapheki baselula nabakrelekrele babonise ukupheka kwabo kwihlabathi.

src: molefe o ile moletlong wo wa difoka ka phupu gola bilbao, spain, ebile o bolela gore e be e le letšatši la tlhohleletšo la go boledišana le baapei ba bangwe.
tgt: umolefe uzimase umsitho wamawonga kweyesilimela ebilbao, espain, kwaye uthi ibilusuku olukhuthazayo noluneengxoxo nabanye abathandi bokutya.

src: "ke bile le mahlatse a go kgona go kopantšha batho go tšwa nageng ka bophara le ba mengwaga ka moka go tla go ipshina ka dijo tša rena.
tgt: "ndibe nethamsanqa lokufumana abantu abasuka kwilizwe lonke kunye nabaneminyaka eyahlukeneyo ubudala ukuba bazokonwabela ukutya kwethu.

src: batho ba nale go nyenya dibere (go ja ditho tša ka teng tša diphoofolo) gomme ke nyaka go ba bontšha gore ge ba ka di apea gabotse, di tla ba monate go swana le seripa sefe goba sefe sa nama.
tgt: abantu baqala ngolugweba ulusu (amalungu angaphakathi esilwanyana atyiwayo) kwaye ndifuna ukubabonisa ukuba uyipheka kakuhle, inokunambitheka nje kamnandi njengayo nayiphi na enye inyama.

src: ke rata gape le go hlohleletša matena a ditho ka moka tša phoofolo, go etiša pele mokgwa wo wa go ja ka tsela ye maleba,’’ a realo molefe.
tgt: ndikwafuna ukukhuthaza ukutyiwa kwesilwanyana usukela empumlweni uya kutsho emsileni, ukulwela indlela ezinzileyo yokutya," utshilo umolefe.

src: emazulwini mathomong a ona ngwaga wo e ithopetše gape sefoka sa go ba resturente ya ngwaga ka moka ya go šoma botse go feta tše dingwe ka moka kua difokeng tša bone tša resturente ya luxe tša go swarwa ngwaga ka ngwaga.
tgt: ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, iemazulwini iphinde yaphumelela iwonga leafrican restaurant of the year kumaluxe restaurant awards esine nabanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka.

src: leano la kagoleswa ya ikonomi le go boetšwa sekeng ga yona emazulwini e thwetše batho ba bane ebile molefe o nale dithulaganyo tša go godiša kgwebo ya gagwe.
tgt: isicwangciso so kwakha ngo kutsha kunye nokuvuselelwa koqoqosho iemazulwini iqeshe abantu abane kwaye umolefe unezicwangciso zokukhulisa ishishini lakhe.

src: o bolela gore bohwa bjo bo humilego bja afrika borwa ke bjona bjo bo gokagoketšago baeti.
tgt: uthi ubutyebi belifa lomzantsi afrika ngoyena ndoqo wokutsala aba khenkethi kweli.

src: bjalo ka karolo ya kagoleswa ya ikonomi le go bušetšwa sekeng ga yona, mmušo o hlaotše lefapha la boeti bjalo ka le lengwe le bohlokwahlokwa ebile e le le legologolo la go hlohleletša go boetšwa sekeng ga ikonomi.
tgt: njengenxalenye yesi cwangciso sokwakha ngokutsha kunye nokuvuselelwa koqoqosho, urhulumente uchonge icandelo lezokhenketho njengenye yemimandla ebalulekileyo yongenelelo kunye noyena mqhubi ungundoqo wokuvuselela uqoqosho.

src: kgoro ya boeti, lefapha la praebete le bakgathatema ba bangwe ba ipopile ngatana ye tee go hlama leano la go boetšwa sekeng ga lefapha la boeti, leo le tla thušago go bopa ditirišanommogo tše logetšwego maano magareng ga mmušo le intasteri go netefatša maitemogelo ao a kaonafetšego a baeti.
tgt: isebe lezokhenketho, icandelo labucala kunye nabanye abachaphazelekayo baye basebenzisana ukuphuhlisa isicwangciso sokuvuselela icandelo lezokhenketho, esiza kunceda ukwenza intsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente kunye namashishini ukuqinisekisa ukuphuculwa indlela yokuphathwa kwaba tyeleli.

src: boloka tšhelete: reka diphahlo tša go se lefišwe metšhelo allison cooper ka baka la ge ditheko tšeo di gaketšego la go šiiša tša go phela mo afrika borwa di ama gampe badudi ka moka, kudukudu bao ba tšwago ka malapeng a letseno la fase, o ka netefatša gore tšhelete ya gago e tšea nako ye telele ge o reka dikrosari ka go topatopa diphahlo tša go se lefišwe metšhelo.
tgt: gcina imali:thenga iimpahla ezingafakelwa rhafu allison cooper ngelixa ukunyuka kweendleko zokuhlala ku thwaxa abemi bomzantsi afrika, ingakumbi abo basuka kumakhaya arhola imivuzo ephantsi, ungaqinisekisa ukuba imali yakho ikunika lukhulu ngokuthi xa uthenga ukutya uthenge izinto ezingafakelwanga rhafu.

src: diphahlo tša go se lefišwe metšhelo ke dijo tše itšego tša bohlokwa tšeo bareki ba sa lefišwego metšhelo go tšona, gomme se se ra gore di rekišwa ka theko ya fase.
tgt: iimpahla ezingafakelwa rhafu kukutya okuthile okusisiseko ekunganya nzelekanga ukuba abantu bahlawule irhafu kuko, nto leyo ethetha ukuba oko kutya kuthengiswa ngexabiso eliphantsi.

src: batho bao ba rekago dipha hlo tša mo lenaneong la tšeodi sa lefišwego metšhelo ba kgona go hwetša diphahlo tše ntšinyana tšheleteng ya bona, gomme seo se ka ba thuša go kgona go bea dijo tša phepo tafoleng.
tgt: abantu abathenga ukutya okuluhlu lweempahla ezingafakelwa rhafu banokufumana ngakumbi ngemali yabo, nto leyo ebanceda ukuba babeke ukutya okunesondlo etafileni.

src: goya ka dipalopalo tša afrika borwa (stats sa), dijo le dino tše sego tša madila (nab) di hlatlogetše godimo ka 8.6% ka phupu ngwaga wa go feta ka fao di bego di bitša ka gona ka phupu ka 2021. ba stats sa ba bolela gore ditšweletšwa tša dijo tšeo di hlatlogilego kudu ke borotho le disirele (go akaretšwa le bupi), nama, oli le makhura – e lego dijo tša go jewa ka mehla ka malapeng a mantši.
tgt: ngokwenkcukachamanani yomzantsi afrika (istats sa), ukutya kunye neziselo ezingenabutywala (inab) zibiza i8.6% ngaphezulu kulo nyaka kweyesilimela kunokuba bekunjalo kweyesilimela ngowama2021.

src: ditšweletšwa tša borotho le tša sirele di hlatlogile ka 11.2% ga e sale go tloga ka phupu 2021, morago ga go hlatloga go tloga go 8.4% ka mopitlo lenyaga, nakong ya ge tšhupane ya ditheko tša bareki (cpi) e hlatloga ka 1.1%.
tgt: istats sa ithe iimveliso zokutya ezonyuke kakhulu sisonka, iinkozo ezitywayo (ezibandakanya umgubo wombona), inyama kunye namafutha konke oku kukutya okusisiseko kwimizi emininzi.

src: tlhatlogo ya kgwedi ka kgwedi e bile 2.6%, ka ditheko tšeo di hlatlogilego ka lebelo tša bupi (5.2%), borotho bjo botsotho (3.2%) le macaroni (3%).
tgt: isonka kunye neemve liso zeenkozo ezityiwayo zinyuke nge11.2% ukususela ngeyesilimela kowama2021, zisuka kwi8.4% kucanzibe walo nyaka, xa isalathiso sexabiso lomthengi (icpi) sinyuke nge1.1%.

src: godimo ga tšohle, ditheko tša nama di hlatlogile ka 9.5% go tloga ka phupu 2021 go fihla ka phupu 2022, ebile di bitša ka theko ya godimo go feta theko yeo di bego di rekwa ka yona ka mopitlo 2022. dioli le makhura di hlatlo gile ngwaga ka ngwaga ka 32.5%, ge di bapetšwa le 26.9% ka mopitlo nakong ya ge cpi e nyologa.
tgt: unyuko lwenyanga lube yi2.6%, amaxabiso onyuke ngokuqaphelekayo ngawomgubo wombona (5.2%), isonka esimdaka (3.2%) kunye nemakharoni (3%).

src: theko ya godimodimo ya oli ya sonoplomo, e bea kgatelelo ye kgolo godimo ga ditekanyetšokabo.
tgt: ukongeza koku, amaxabiso enyama anyuke nge9.5% ukusuka kweyesilimela kowama2021 ukuya kweyesilimela wama2022, kwaye axabisa ngaphezulu kancinci kunokuba ebenzile kuca nzibe wama2022.

src: boloka tšhelete ka diphahlo tša go se lefišwe metšhelodiphahlo tša go se lefišwe metšhelo di tsebagaditšwe ke mmušo ka 1992 go thuša malapa a letseno la fase.
tgt: amafutha anyuka ngo nyaka kangangama32.5%, xa kuthelekiswa nama26.9% kucanzibe xa kunyuke icpi.

src: ga e sale di tsebagatšwa la mathomothomo, dipha hlo tše dingwe tše ntši di tsentšhitšwe lenaneong le.
tgt: iindleko eziphezulu zamafutha, ngokukodwa, zibeka uxinzelelo olongezelelweyo kuhlahlo lwabiwomali.

src: a re thekgeng maphodisa gore afrika borwa e bolokege vukuzenzele unnamed go nale tlalelo le pefelo tše golelago godimo setšhabeng ka maemo a bosenyi ka mo nageng ya gaborena.
tgt: xhasa amapolisa ukwenza umzantsi afrika ukhuseleke vukuzenzele unnamed kuyakhula uku phoxeka kunye nomsindo woluntu ngamanqanaba olwaphulomthetho kwilizwe lethu.

src: tiragalo ye hlagilego maloba nyana mo ya go hulwa le go katwa ga basetsana ba seswai ke sehlopha sa banna gola krugersdorp e hlotše pefelo setšhabeng ka moka le go hlohleletša magato a go ba le mošito kgahlanong le dihlophana tša meepo ye sego molaong tša go ihlama ka dibetša tšeo di šomang lefelong le.
tgt: uphango lwakutsha nje kunye nokudlwengulwa kwabasetyhini abasebatsha abasibhozo yimigulukudu ekrugersdorp kubangele isanxwe kwilizwe lonke, kwaye kukhokelele ekubeni kufunwe amanyathelo angqongqo ngakumaqela axhobileyo yabo bomba imigodi ngokungekho semthethweni nesebenza kulo mmandla.

src: ditebogo di lebišwa go ba ditirelo tša maphodisa a afrika borwa ka magato a bona a mošito mo dibekeng tše tharo tša go feta go phenkgišana le ditiragalo tša go kata ka sehlopha le bosenyi mo lefelong le.
tgt: inkonzo yesipolisa yasemzantsi afrika ifanele kukunconywa ngezenzo zayo ezigqibeleleyo kwezi veki zintathu zidlulileyo, zokuphendula kudlwengulo kunye nakulwaphulomthetho olwenziwe yilemigulukudu kulo mmandla.

src: le ge go le bjalo, setšhaba se tloga se laeditše gore e se be fela bosenyi bja maemo a godimo bjo mafelelong bo tšeelwago magato kgahlanong le go gataka molao.
tgt: nangona kunjalo, uluntu luye lachaza ukuba akumelanga kuthathe ulwaphulomthetho oluphezulu ukuze kube kanti kukhona kuthathwa amanyathelo ngakulwaphulomthetho.

src: nnete ke gore go nale ditlhotlo tše hlobaetšago kudu tšeo dilebaganego le sephodisa sa afrika borwa eupša re šoma ka thata go di fenya.
tgt: inyaniso yeyokuba kukho imingeni enzima ejongene nomsebenzi wesipolisa emzantsi afrika.

src: go swana le dikgoro tša mmušo ka moka, ditirelo tša maphodisa a afrika borwa le tšona di angwa gampe ke ditlamorago tša seemo sa go se leše di wela sa matlotlo a naga ye, mengwaga ye mmalwa ya go hlaelela ga bašomi le go gogwa ga mmušo ka nko.
tgt: njengawo onke amasebe ka rhulumente, inkonzo yesipo lisa yasemzantsi afrika iyaliva ifuthe lengxaki yezemali yelizwe, yeminyaka emininzi kungaqeshwa basebenzi kunye nelokubanjwa ngobhongwane kukarhulumente.

src: se sengwe gape, maphodisa le bona ba šoma maemong a šoro fao nako tše dingwe ba gapeletšago ke seemo go nkgišetšana mahwafa le dikgaruru, dikgobalo goba ona mahu.
tgt: amalungu amapolisa asebenza kwiindawo eziyingozi apho kufuneka ejongane nobundlobongela, ukwenzakala okanye ukufa.

src: ge re sena lebotho la maphodisa la go tia, la bokgoni le la go tseba mošomo, bosenyi ka mo afrika borwa bo ka se tsoge bo fedile.
tgt: ulwaphulomthetho emzantsi afrika alusoze luphele ngaphandle ko mbutho wamapolisa oliqi lima, okwaziyo ukwenza umsebenzi kwaye oqeqe shekileyo.

src: tlhaelelo ya bašomi ka gare ga saps ke ye nngwe ya hlobaboroko yeo sale ya hlagišwa pegong ya sehlopha sa ditsebi sa go šetšana le megwanto ya mosegamanye 2021, yeo gabjale e tšeelwago magato go tla ka tharollo.
tgt: izikhewu ezikhoyo esaps ngomnye wemiba ephawulwe kwingxelo yegqiza leengcali kwizixholoxholo ezenzeke kweyekhala ngowama2021, nesithatha amanyathelo ukulungisa oko.

src: morago ga gore seemo seo se tieletšego se boetšwe sekeng go boetapele bja saps, šedi ya rena gonabjale ke go šogašogana le tlhaelelo ya maphodisa yeo e dirilego gore mabotho a rena a phethagatšo ya molao a ikhwetše a se a itokišetša go mekamekana le ditiragalo tša kgwedi ya mosegamanye ngwageng wa go feta.
tgt: emva kokubuyisela uzinzo obelufuneka kakhulu kwii nkokeli zesaps, ngoku sigxile ekuvaleni izikhewu ezithe zakhokelela ekubeni abasemagunyeni bogcinomthetho bafunyanwe bengakulungelanga ukujo ngana neziganeko eze nzeke kweyekhala kunyaka odlulileyo.

src: tlhaelelo ya bašomi le go hloka tlhahlo ya maleba di bile le ditlamorago tše mpe tlhapetšong ya setšhaba le ka lekaleng la maphodisa la go šogašogana le megwanto.
tgt: ukungaqeshwa kwabase benzi kunye nokungabikho koqeqesho olwaneleyo kube nefuthe elibi ngokukodwa kuluntu kunye nakucwangco loluntu.

src: mmušo o lokolotše tšhelete ya go goketša baithutelabophodisa ba baswa ba 12 000, ebile sehlopha sa mathomo se gare se fiwa tlhahlo ya motheo.
tgt: urhulumente ubeke imali ukuze kuqeshwe amapolisa amatsha angama12 000, kwaye iqela lokuqala kungoku lifumana uqeqesho olusisiseko.

src: diyuniti tša saps tša megwanto ya setšhaba di tla amogela maloko a tlaleletšo a 4 000 ngwaga wo, ebile dipeakanyo di gare di a dirwa go hlahla maloko a mangwe ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt: icandelo lo cwangco loluntu lesaps liza kufumana amanye amalungu angama4 000 kulo nyakamali, kwaye amalungiselelo oqeqesho olufanelekileyo la lamalungu luyenziwa.

src: ka go ithuta go tšwa ditiragalong tša mosegamanye ngwaga wa go feta, re šoma ka thata go kaonafatša tšhomišanommogo magareng ga mabotho a phethagatšo ya molao le inta steri ya tšhireletšego ya praebete phenkgišanong ya rena kgahlanong le bosenyi.
tgt: ngokufunda kwizixholo xholo ezenzeke ngeye khala kunyaka odlulileyo, sisebenzela ukuphucula intsebenziswano phakathi kweearhente zogcinomthetho kunye neshishini labucala lokhuseleko eku lweni ulwaphulomthetho.

src: re swanetše go šoma bjalo ka monwana le lenala le bakgathatema ka moka, go akaretšwa dikgwebo, gore methopo ka moka le bohlodi bja bosenyi di abelwe ka go lekalekana go kaonafatša bobedi polokego ya setšhaba le go šogašogana le bosenyi bjo bo šwalalantšhago ditiragalo tša ikonomi.
tgt: sifuna intsebenziswano engqongqo nabo bonke abachaphazelekayo, kuqukwa nabezoshishino, ukuze kwabelwane ngezixhobo kunye nobuntlola bolwaphulomthetho ukuze kuphuculwe ukhuseleko loluntu kwaye kujongwane nolwaphulomthetho oluphazamisa imisebenzi yezoqoqosho.

src: mohlala wa se ke tšhomišanommogo magareng ga ditimela tša merwalo tša transnet le saps go lwantšhana le bohodu bja mananeokgoparara le go senywa ga megala ya mohlagase ka boomo.
tgt: umzekelo, kukho intsebenzi swano phakathi kwetransnet freight rail kunye nesaps yokulwa nobusela beziseko ezingundoqo kunye nokonakaliswa kwentambo zogesi.

src: mohlala wo mongwe wa tšhomišanommogo ke magareng ga baletakgoro ba moepo, baletakgoro ba praebete le saps go lwantšha bohodu bja dimetale tša majabajaba.
tgt: olu lwaphulomthetho luchaphazela kakhulu uqoqosho njengoko iinkampani zingasakwazi ukuhambisa iimveliso zazo kumazibuko eli ukuze zithunyelwe kumazwe angaphandle.

src: ka baka la maitekelo a a mohlakanelwa, re bona mošomo o gatela pele diprofenseng tša go swana le mpumalanga le limpopo tšeo e bego e le hlobaboroko ye kgolo ka seemo sa tšona sa go se laolege ka baka la ge dimetale tšeo di utswitšwego di ile tša išwa mebarakeng ya mešikašika ka dinageng tša mošola.
tgt: omnye umzekelo wentsebenziswano uphakathi kokhuseleko lo mgodi, ukhuseleko lwabu cala kunye nesaps ukulwa ubusela beentsimbi ezixabisekileyo.

src: ka diyuniti tša yona tša bosetšhaba tša go lwantšha bosenyi, saps e be e gatela pele go lwantšha dihlopha tša bosenyi tša go ipopa, go akaretšwa le dihlopha tša go gweba ka diokobatši, dihlopha tša bosenyi ka kakaretšo le meepo ye sego molaong.
tgt: ngenxa yezi nzame zidityanisiweyo, sibona inkqubelaphambili kwimimandla efana nempumalanga kunye nelimpopo eziye zazindawo ezibonakalisa ukungazinzi njengoko iintsimbi ezibiweyo bezisuswa zisiwe kwiimarike ezingekho mthethweni phesheya.

src: saps e gare e hloma sehlophatšhomo go šogašogana le meepo ye sego molaong, go bapa le dihlophatšhomo tše dingwe tša go swaragana le go tšewa ga tšhelete ka kgang mafelong a kago, bohodu bja koporo le dikheibole, le go utswiwa le tshenyo ka boomo ya mananeokgoparara a ikonomi.
tgt: ngokusebenzisa amacandelo ayo esizwe okungenelela, isaps nayo iqhubela phambili ekulweni ulwaphulomthetho olucwangcisiweyo, kubandakanywa amaqela eziyobisi, amaqela emigulukudu kunye nokwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho semthethweni.

src: ntle le diphenyo tša tlhapetšo ya go ba le mohola ya sephodisa go šogašogana le bosenyi bja ikonomi, mošomo wo boimaima wa saps wa go swaragana le boseyi ka kakaretšo o fela o hlaetšwa mahlo.
tgt: isaps iseka igqiza elijongene nokwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho semthethweni, kunye namanye amaqela asebenzayo ajongene nokuxhwilwa kwee ndawo zokuhlala, ukubiwa kobhedu kunye neentambo zogesi, ubusela kunye nokonakaliswa kweziseko ezingundoqo zoqoqosho.

src: mo ngwageng wa go feta wa ditšhelete, go fa mohlala, lekala la dinyakišišo tša bosenyi la saps le file dikahlolelo tša bophelo ka moka tše 206 kgahlanong le babonwamolato ba 209, tše 154 tša tšona e be e le tša polao le go kata.
tgt: singayilibelanga impu melelo yomsebenzi wamapolisa ekujongeni ulwaphulomthetho kwezoqoqosho, ukusebenza nzima kwesaps ekujongeni ulwaphulomthetho gabalala amaxesha amaninzi akujongelwa ntweni.

src: diyuniti tša saps tša dikgaruru tša ka malapeng, tšhireletšo ya bana le melato ya tša thobalano di file dikahlolelo tša bophelo ka moka tše 356 kgahlanong le babonwamolato ba 266. ka diphuruphutšo tša go lota mehlala ya babelaelwa, go golegilwe batho ba go feta 13 000. ka baka la maemo a godimodimo a bosenyi setšhabeng sa gaborena, nnete ke gore go sana le tše ntši tše swanetšego go dirwa.
tgt: kulo nyakamali upheli leyo, umzekelo, icandelo lophando lolwaphulomthetho lwesaps lizuze izigwebo zobomi ezingama206 kubatyholwa abangama209, abali154 kubo ibingawokubulala kunye nawokudlwengula.

src: le ge go le bjalo, dipalopalo tše di laetša gore badirabosenyi ba bantši ba gare ba golegwa le go sekišwa go fihla mafelelong.
tgt: icandelo lesaps elijongene nobundlobongela bosapho, ukhuseleko lwabantwana kunye namatyala olwaphulomthetho ngokwesondo lizuze izigwebo zobomi ezingama356 kubatyholwa abangama266.

src: lebotho la sephodisa sa afrika borwa la nyakišišo ya melato ya maemo a godimo, la go tsebega ka dihawks, le fihleletše dinepo tša lona ka moka ngwageng wo fetilego wa ditšhelete, gomme dipoelo tša gona ebile go golega le go phara batho ka melato, go amogwa ga thoto, ditaelo tša kgorotsheko tša kiletšo le tša kamogo le ditaelo tša kgoro tsheko ka kamogo ya thoto ya boleng bja dimilione tša diranta.
tgt: amaphulo okulandela umrhanelwa abangele ukubanjwa kwabantu abangaphezu kwe13 000. ngenxa yezinga eliphe zulu lolwaphulomthetho kuluntu lwethu, kucacile ukuba kuninzi ekusafuneka kwenziwe.

src: godimo ga bao ba golegilego le go pharwa melato ke dihawks go akaretšwa ba meepo ye sego molaong, tshenyo ya diphaephe tša dibešwa, go swara poo dikoloi tša go tsamaiša tšhelete le go bolaya maphodisa.
tgt: kodwa la manani abonisa ukuba uninzi lwezaphulimthetho luyabanjwa kwaye lutshutshiswe ngempumelelo.

src: maphodisa ba ka se atlege ka ntle le tšhomišano ya setšhaba.
tgt: abavunyelwa ukuba bophula umthetho njee gqiba kungabikho ziphumo.

src: ka lona lebaka le, re beile šedi ya rena godimo ga go oketša palo ya dihlopha tša badudi tše di šomišanago le maphodisa (cpf) go kaonafatša bobedi dikamano tša maphodisa le tša setšhaba.
tgt: icandelo lophando lolwaphulomthetho olubalulekileyo, elaziwa ngokuba ngookhetshe, liphumeze konke ebelijolise kuko kulo nyakamali uphelileyo, okubangele ukuba kubanjwa, kugwetywe, kuhluthwe impahla, kufunyanwe izithintelo kunye nezi yalelo zokuthinjwa kunye nemiyalelo yokuhluthwa kwezinto okuxabisa izigidi zeerandi.

src: ditheto di lebišwa go batho setšhabeng bao ba tšeago maikarabelo a go dira gore mafelo a bona a bolokege ka go hlapetša mebila, go dira masolo a temošo ya bosenyi le tše dingwe tša ditiragalo.
tgt: ukubanjwa kunye nezigwebo ezifunyaniswe ngookhetshe zibandakanya ukombiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho semthethweni, ukonakaliswa kwemibhobho yepetroli, ukuphangwa kwemali kunye nokubulawa kwamapolisa.

src: ka go šomiša pego ya sehlo pha sa ditsebi bjalo ka motheo wa go hlama ka leswa kgoro ye, re gare re beakanya ka leswa le go fetola merero ya didirišwa, go kaonafatša mabokgoni le go maatlafatša mabokgoni a phethagatšo ya molao mafa pheng ka moka.
tgt: ookhetshe baqalise ukuse benza necandelo lophando lenpa kumatyala aphuma kwikomishini yokubanjwa ngobhongwane kukarhulumente.

src: go ba lephodisa, o kaba o le monna goba o le mosadi, e tloga e le mšomo wo boima kudu, wa go šoma ka fase ga kgatelelo le wo šoro ka mo nageng, ebile gantši ke mošomo wo batho ba se nago tebogo ya bjona.
tgt: isaps ibisoloko ixhasa umlo ojongene nobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini, iseke amagumbi alungele amaxhoba kwizikhululo zamapolisa kwaye yathenga malunga nesiqingatha sesigidi sezixhobo zokuqokelela ubungqina ukuze zisasazwe kwizikhululo.

src: mokgwa o moswa wa go lwantšha bomenetša o hwetša dipoelo vukuzenzele unnamed ntwa kgahlanong le bomenetša e hloka bobedi go nyaka fao go sa tekatekego ga baetapele ba dipolotiki le dihlongwa tša go lwantšha bosenyi tše di ikemego le tše di tsebago mošomo wa tsona.
tgt: indlela entsha yokulwa urhwaphilizo ifumana iziphumo vukuzenzele unnamed umlo wokulwa urhwaphilizo ufuna zombini intando eqinileyo yezo politiko kunye namaziko azimeleyo anako ukulwa ulwaphulomthetho.

src: ka polelong ya ka ya mathomo ka ga seemo sa naga, ka 2018, ke ile ka ikgafa go fetoša ntwa kgahlanong le bomenetša ka dihlongweng tša mmušo le go lwantšha bomenetša le go kwanela ditheko ka lekaieng la phraebete ka tsepelelo le maikemišetšo ao a swanago.
tgt: kwintetho yobume besizwe yam yokuqala, ngowama2018, ndenza isibophelelo sokuguqula imeko ngokuchasene no rhwaphilizo kumaziko ethu oluntu kunye nokulwa ubuqhophololo kunye nentsebenziswano kwicandelo labucala ngendlela eqatha nene njongo efanayo.

src: go tloga ka yona nako yeo, re be re šoma ka maatla go maatlafatša le go thekga ditheo tša rena tša phethagatšo ya molao le tše dingwe tše di amegago.
tgt: ukusukela ngoko, besi sebenza nzima ukomeleza kunye nokuxhasa ukutho tyelwa komthetho kunye neearhente ezinxulume neyo.

src: re ile ra hloma lekala la dinyakišišo ka bolaoding bja bosekiši bja bosetšhaba gore bo šome ka bomenetša bjo bogolo le kgorotsheko ye e kgethegilego go kgontšha gore go be bonolo gore lekala la dinyakišišo leo le ikgethilego (siu) le hwetše ditšhelete tše di utswitšwego.
tgt: siye saseka ulawulo lwegunya lotshutshiso lwesizwe ukuze lujongane norhwaphilizo olunobu zaza kunye nenkundla yamatyala ekhethekileyo ukuze icandelo lophando elikhethekileyo (isiu) likwazi ukubuyisa kwa khona iimali ezibiweyo.

src: re fane gape ka thekgo le methopo go dihlongwa tše dingwe tša go lwantšha bosenyi tše bohlokwa tša go swana le lekala la go hula dithoto, lekala la melato ya kgwebo ye e kgethegilego le bolaodi bja dinyakišišo tša bosenyi bjo bo beilwego pele, bjo bo tsebjago bjalo ka the hawks.
tgt: sikwanikezele ngenkxaso kunye nezibonelelo kwamanye amaqumrhu abalulekileyo okulwa ulwaphulomthetho afana necandelo lokuthinjwa kwempahla, icandelo lolwaphulomthetho elikhethekileyo lwezo rhwebo kunye necandelo lophando lolwaphulomthetho eliphakamileyo, elaziwa ngokuba ngoo khetshe.

src: matsapa a a tšweletša dipoelo.
tgt: ezi nzame zivelisa izi phumo.

src: ka go dirišana le dihlongwa tše bohlokwa ka lenaneong la toka go bosenyi, lekala la dinyakišišo le ngwadišitše melato ya bomenetša ya go feta ye 20 ka ngwageng wa ditšhelete wo o fetilego gomme batho bao ba bego ba gononelwa ba 65 ba pharilwe ka melato.
tgt: ngentsebenziswano namaqumrhu aphambili kwinkqubo yobulungisa kulwaphulomthetho, icandelo lophando libhalise ngaphezulu kwamatyala orhwaphilizo angama20 kunyakamali odlulileyo kwaye aba tyholwa abangama65 baye bamangalelwa.

src: bona ba akaretša melato ya go amana le go ‘goga mmušo ka nko’ le melato ye mengwe ya bomenetša bjo bo šiišago.
tgt: ezi zinto ziquka 'ukubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane' kunye namanye amatyala orhwaphilizo anobuzaza.

src: ka ngwageng wa ditšhelete wo o fetilego, lekala la go hula dithoto le hweditše ditaelo tša go emiša tshepedišo ya dišhelete tša boleng bja r5.4 pilione tšeo di amanago le melato ya bomenetša, fao e lego gore r70 milione e lefilwe ka go sekhwama sa khwetšo ya dithoto tša bosenyi.
tgt: kulo nyakamali uphelileyo, icandelo lo kuthinjwa kwempahla lifumene imiyalelo yo kuthintelwa ekusetye nzisweni kwempahla exabisa iibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi5.4 ezinxulumene namatyala olwaphulomthetho, apho izigidi zeerandi ezingama70 zihlawulwe kwingxowamali yokubuyisa impahla yolwaphulomthetho.

src: mo mengwageng ye seswai ye e fetilego, siu e hweditše ditšhelete le dithoto tša boleng bja r2.6 pilione gomme ya beela thoko di konteraka tša boleng bja r18 pilione.
tgt: kule minyaka isibhozo idlulileyo, isiu iye yafu mana inkxasomali kunye neempahla ezixabisa ibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi2.6 yaza yabekela bucala iikhontrakthi ezixabisa ibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili18.

src: palomoka ya melato ye 119 ya go bitša tšhelete ye e fetago r13 pilione e ngwadišitšwe ke siu ka kgorotshgekong ye e kgethegilego.
tgt: amatyala ali119 ewonke axabisa ngaphezulu kweebhiliyoni zeerandi ezili13 abhaliswe kwisiu kwinkundla yamatyala ekhethekileyo.

src: ditiro tša bomenetša ke bosenyi bjo bo hlakahlaka nego go ka di sekiša.
tgt: urhwaphilizo lulwaphulomthetho oluntsonkothileyo ekufu neka lutshutshiswe.

src: batho bao ba dirago ditiro tše ba tloga ba tšea matsapa a magolo kudu go khupetša mehlala ya bona.
tgt: abenzi bobubi benza imigudu emangalisayo yokugquma imikhondo yabo.

src: ba hloma dikhamphani tša dipuku tša ditšhelete go fihla dikgwebišano tša bona tše di sego molaong, gomme ka pela ba fetišetša ditšhelete magareng ga diakhaonte tše ntši, ba fa tshedimošo ya maaka ka ga letseno go ba taolo ya metšhelo ka nageng, gomme, ge e le gore ke bašomi ba mmušo, ba šomiša bagwera le ba leloko go dira dikgopelo tša dithentara go pipa go kgatha tema ga bona.
tgt: baseka iinkampani ezisemthethweni nezi ngasebenziyo ukufihla iintengiselwano ezingalu nganga, bethubelezisa iimali ngokukhawuleza phakathi kweeakhawunti ezininzi, ezibonakalisa ingeniso ngendlela enge yiyo kumagunya erhafu, kwaye, kwimeko yabase benzi bakarhulumente, basebenzisa izihlobo nezalamane ukufaka izicelo zeethenda ukufihla uku bandakanyeka kwabo.

src: se se ra gore mokgwa wo ba taolo ba tla o šomišago go thulana le bosenyi bjo le wona o swanetše go hlaka hlakana kudu go swana le bona bosenyi bjoo.
tgt: oku kuthetha ukuba impendulo yabasema gunyeni kufuneka ibe nobugocigoci.

src: ka 2020, re ile ra hloma lefelo la kopanyomešomo la makala a mantši bjalo ka lefelo la go tlala batho la phethagatšo ya mošomo go rarolla melato ya bosenyi ye e beilwego pele, go akaretšwa le bomenetša.
tgt: ngowama2020, siseke iziko ifusion centre eline zinto ezininzi enjengeziko lokusebenzela ukulungi sa ulwaphulomthetho oluphambili kwezemali, kuquka urhwaphilizo.

src: lefelo le le kopanya mmogo bokgoni bja dinyakišišo bja makala a mmušo a thibelo ya bosenyi le tšhireletšo le bja lefelo la bohlodi bja ditšhelete, leo le hlomago bohlodi bja ditheo tša phethagatšo ya mošomo go bo šomiša ka dinyakišišong tša bona.
tgt: eli ziko lidibanisa ndawonye amandla ophando othintelo lolwaphulomthetho kunye namaqumrhu okhuseleko karhulumente kunye nalawo eziko lezobuntlola bezezimali, eliphuhlisa ubuntlola ukuze iiarhente zogcinomthetho zibuse benzise kuphando lwazo.

src: mengwaga ye mebedi go tloga mola lefelo la kopanyomešomo le hlo ngwago, mokgwa wa lona wa makala a mantši a ‘go latelela tšhelete’ o tšweleditše dipoelo tše kgolo.
tgt: iminyaka emibini ukususela ekusekweni kwefusion centre , indlela yalo ebandakanya abantu abavela kwiintlobo ezahlukeneyo zomsebenzi ‘yokulandela imali’ iye yavelisa iziphumo ezibalu lekileyo.

src: mo ngwageng wo o fetilego, mošomo wa lefelo la kopanyomešomo o thekgile dinyakišišo tša tsogolekobong le bomenetša tše 276. tšhelete ye e ka bago r659 milione e bušeditšwe mmušong ka go lota le go hwetša dipoelo tša go hwetšwa ka bosenyi.
tgt: kulo nyakamali upheli leyo, umsebenzi wefusion centre uxhase uphando lobuqhophololo norhwa philizo olungama276.

src: tshepedišo ya tšhelete ye e ka bago r613 milione yeo e hweditšwego ka ditiro tše go belaelwago gore ke tša bosenyi e ile ya emišwa.
tgt: malunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama659 zabuyiselwa kurhulumente ngendlela yokulondoloza kunye nokubuyiswa kwengeniso yolwaphulomthetho.

src: lefelo la kopanyomešomo mathomong le ile la hlongwa ka maikgafo a go nyakišiša bomenetša bja mabapi le dithendara tše di amanago le covid .
tgt: malunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama613 eziyinge niso yolwaphulomthetho olurhanelwayo ziye zathi ntelwa ekusetyenzisweni.

src: mošomo wa lona bjale o katološitšwe go akaretšwa go hlatswa tšhelete, bora dia, tšhomišobošaedi ya ditšhelete, go thekga bogo gelathoko ka ditšhelete le melato ye mengwe ye e šiišago ya ditšhelete.
tgt: ifusion centre ekuqaleni yamiselwa ukuphanda urhwaphilizo olumalunga nenkqubo yokufumana abanikizinkonzo enxu lumene necovid19 .

src: mo nakong ye e sa tšwago go feta the hawks e adile kgatelopele yeo e dirilwe go ke sehlophatšhomo sa twantšho ya bomenetša, yeo lekala la kopanyomošomo le bopago karolo ya yona.
tgt: umyalelo wayo ngoku uyandiswa ukuze uquke ukuthutyeleziswa kwemali, ubuqhophololo, ulawulo olugwenxa, inkxasomali yabanqolobi kunye nolunye ulwaphulomthetho lwezemali olunobuzaza.

src: magareng ga ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2019 le wa 2022, bagononelwa ba 554 ba ile ba golegwa gore ba dirile bomenetša, gomme go bona ba 142 ba ile ba bonwa molato.
tgt: ookhetshe kutsha nje bachaze enye yenkqubelaphambili esele yenziwe liqela lokulwa urhwa philizo, apho ifusion centre iba yinxalenye yalo.

src: ngwageng wo o fetilego, sars e phethile ditekodišišo tša mekgwa ya bophelo tše 25 tša boleng bja r450 milione ka nakong ya go rarolla go se amane magareng ga letseno leo le begilwego le mokgwa wa bophelo wa motho.
tgt: phakathi konyakamali wama2019 kunye nowama2022, abarha nelwa abangama554 babanjelwa urhwaphilizo, apho abali142 kubo baye bagwetywa.

src: go molaleng gore magato ao re a tšerego bjalo ka pušo ye a go bušetša sekeng bokgoni, botsebi le seriti sa dihlongwa tšeo di kgathago tema ka ntweng kgahlanong le bomenetša a na le seabe seo se bonagalago.
tgt: esinye isixhobo esi balulekileyo sobuntlola kwezemali luphicothozi ncwadi lwendlela yoku phila olwenziwa yinkonzo yerhafu yomzantsi afrika (isars).

src: mošomo wo o kopa ntšwego wa ditheo tša phethagatšo ya molao ka moka o betha basenyi fao ba kwago bohloko kudu gona: ka dipotleng tša bona.
tgt: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, isars igqibe uphicothozincwadi lwendlela yokuphila olungama25 oluxabisa ngaphezulu kwezigidi zeerandi ezingama450 ukusombulula ukunga ngqinelani phakathi kwengeniso echaziweyo kunye nendlela yokuphila yomntu.

src: ditšhelete tša setšhaba tšeo di utswitšwego le go timetšwa di a utollwa gomme bao ba rwelego maikarabelo a ditiro tše ba sekišwa ke dikgorotsheko tša rena.
tgt: kucacile ukuba amanya thelo esiwathathileyo njengolu lawulo lokubu yisela amandla okwenza, ubuchule kunye nokuthe mbeka kwamaziko aba ndakanyekayo kumlo wokulwa norhwaphilizo zinempembelelo ebona kalayo.

src: go tšwela pele go maatlafatša matsapa a rena a go fetoša ntwa kgahlanong le bomenetša, ke tsebagatša go thwalwa ga batho go ya ka lekgotleng la keletšo kgahlanong le bomenetša la bosetšhaba.
tgt: umsebenzi olungele lanisiweyo wazo zonke iiarhente zokunyanze liswa komthetho ubetha abaphulimthetho apho kubuhlungu kakhulu khona: kwiipokotho zabo.

src: lebelela maswao a kankere ya bana nako e sa le gona more matshediso tlhokego ya temošo ya kankere ya bana le maswao a yona go ra gore bontši bja bana ba ka afrika borwa ba phekolwa gore ba na le bolwetši bjo ge bo šetše go kekile.
tgt: jonga iimpawu zokuqala zomhlaza wasebuntwaneni more matshediso ukunqongophala kolwazi ngomhlaza wasebuntwaneni kunye neempawu zawo kuthetha ukuba abantwana abaninzi basemzantsi afrika baxilongwa xa isifo sikwi nqanaba eliphezulu.

src: ge kankere e ka phekolwa nako e sa le gona gomme ya alafša, go na le kgonagalo ye ntši ya gore molwetše a ka fola fodi.
tgt: umhlaza osaqalayo uyaxi longwa kwaye unyangwe, liphezulu ithuba lokuchacha ngokupheleleyo.

src: mokgokaganyi wa dipoledišano wa setheo sa kankere ya bana sa afrika borwa (choc) taryn see gers o bolela gore ge o tseba maswao ao a tlwaelegilego a kankere go bana, o ka thuša go phološa bophelo.
tgt: umququzeleli wonxi belelwano lwechildhood cancer foundation south africa (ichoc) utaryn seegers uthi ngokwazi iimpawu ezixhaphakileyo zomhlaza kulutsha, kunganceda ukusindisa ubomi.

src: "dika le maswao go ka ba boima go a bona ka lebaka la ge bana e le setlwaedi go ba le dikutwana, go ruruga, go gola ka lebelo le go tšeega maikutlo kgafetšakgafetša.
tgt: "iimpawu kunye nemi qondiso kunokuba nzima ukuzibona phakathi kwa maqhuma aqhelekileyo, imigruzuko, ukukhula ngokukhawuleza kunye nokuguquguquka kwesi mo sengqondo.

src: le ge go le bjale, go utolla bolwetši bjo ka pela go bohlokwa," a realo.
tgt: nangona kunjalo, ukufunyaniswa kwangethuba kubalulekile," utshilo.

src: go ya ka mokgatlo wa kankere wa afrika borwa (cansa), magareng ga bana ba 800 go fihla go ba 1 000 ba ka afrika borwa ba phekolwa gore ba na le kankere ngwaga o mongwe le o mongwe.
tgt: ngokwengxelo yecancer association of south africa (icansa), baphakathi kwama800 ukuya kwi 1 000 abantwana base mzantsi afrika abaxilo ngelwa umhlaza kunyaka ngamnye.

src: le ge go le bjale, mokgatlo wo o akanya gore seripa gare sa bana bao ba nago le kankere ka afrika borwa ga ba ke ba phekolwa gore ba na le yona.
tgt: nangona kunjalo, lo mbutho uqikelela ukuba isiqingatha sabantwana aba nomhlaza emzantsi afrika abazange baxilongwa.

src: go thuša go netefatša gore kankere e utollwa ka pela ka fao go kgonagalago, choc e sepetša mananeo a temošo ditšhabeng, e botša batswa di le bana ka ga maswao a ka pela a temošo ya kanke re ao ba swanetšego go a hlokomela.
tgt: ukunceda ukuqinisekisa ukuba umhlaza ubonwe ngokukhawuleza, ichoc iqhuba iinkqubo zokwa zisa uluntu, ixelela abazali nabantwana ngeempawu ezilumkisa kwangethuba ekufuneka baziqaphele.

src: setheo se se thekga bana le bafsa ba mahlalagading ba ba nago le kankere goba malwetši a go ba kotsi a madi gammogo le ba malapa a bona.
tgt: eliziko lixhasa abantwa na kunye nolutsha olunomhlaza okanye olu nokuphazamiseka kwegazi okusongela ubomi kunye neentsapho zabo.

src: "re ikemišeditše go kaonafatša bokgoni bja go utolla kankere ka pela le go nolofatša kalafo ye e šomago gabotse.
tgt: "sijonge ukuphucula ukufunyaniswa kwange thuba kwaye siququzelele unyango olusebenzayo.

src: ka nako efe goba efe, choc e ka kgona go hlokomela bana le bafsa ba mahlalagading ba go feta ba 1 500, mola ka go le lengwe e fana ka thekgo ya tša leago go malapa a go feta a 1 500," gwa bolela seegers.
tgt: nangaliphi na ixesha, ichoc inokuba nabantwa na abangaphezulu kwe 1 500 kunye nolutsha kukhathalelo lwayo, ngelixa inika inkxaso ngokwasengqondweni nangokwasentlalweni kwiintsapho ezingaphe zulu kwe1 500," utshilo useegers.

src: mo ngwageng wa ditšhelete wo o fetilego, seegers o bolela gore choc e kgonne go direla bana ba 1 724, bafsa ba mahlalaga ding ba 553 le batho ba bagolo ba 2 232 ka go diriša mananeo a yona a motheo.
tgt: kunyakamali ophelileyo, useegers uthi ichoc ikwazile ukunceda aba ntwana abali1 724, ulutsha olungama553 kunye nabantu abadala abangama2 232 ngee nkqubo zayo ezingundoqo.

src: "ditirelo tša rena di akaretša thekgo ya maikutlo ge ba le gare ba phela le kankere, khomotšo, tlho komelo ya bao ba bakwago le badimo le thekgo ka tša poloko go bao ba hlokofaletšwego," gwa bolela seegers.
tgt: "iinkonzo zethu ziquka inkxaso yeemvakalelo ngendlela yohambo lwabo lomhlaza, intuthuzelo, ukhathalelo lokuphela kobomi kunye nenkxaso yokuzila," utshilo useegers.

src: maswao a kanke re ya bana ao a reetšwego ka st siluan s – nyaka thušo ya tša kalafo e sa le ka pela mabapi le maswao ao a sa iphodišego.
tgt: iimpawu zomhlaza wasebuntwaneni zest siluan s – funa uncedo lwe zonyango kwangethuba ngeempawu eziqhube kayo.

src: i – dipatso tše tšhweu ka leihlong, go thoma go leana mahlo, go foufala mo go hlagelelago go na mo goba thaka ya leihlo ye e rurugago.
tgt: i ibala elimhlophe elisweni, ukufifithekisa, ukungaboni ngequbu liso, ikhozo lweliso elithe phuhlu.

src: mpshafatšo ya n3 e matlafatša maafrika borwa owen mngadi mduduzi jijana ke mong wa disability empowerment movement yeo e lego ye nngwe ya dikhamphani tšeo di holegago gabjale go tšwa mpshafatšong ya tsela ya lephefo ya n3 yeo e jelego dibilione tše 26 tša diranta gareng ga pietermaritzburg le durban ka kwazulunatal.
tgt: uphuculo lwen3 luxhobisa abemi bomzantsi afrikaezempilo owen mngadi umduduzi jijana ongumnini wombutho wokuxho tyiswa kwabakhubazekileyo, sithetha nje inkampani yakhe ingenye yeenkampani ezixhamlayo kolu phuculo oluxabisa ir26 yeebhiliyoni olwenziwa kuhola wendlela un3 pha kathi komgungundlovu nasethekwini kwiphondo lakwakwazulunatal.

src: projeke ye, yeo e etilwego pele ke ba south african national road agency soc limited (sanral), e netefatša gore baipereki ba bjalo ka jijana ga ba holege feela empa ba hlolela le batho ba bangwe mešomo.
tgt: eli phulo, nelikhokelwa yisouth afri can national road agency soc limited (isanral), liqinisekisa ukuba oosomashishini abafana nojijana abaxhamli nje kuphela kodwa bakwadala amathuba emisebenzi eluntwini.

src: jijana, yoo a phelago ka bogolofadi, o re khamphani ya gagwe e tsenya maswao a tsela gareng ga hilton le pietermaritzburg.
tgt: ujijana, nophila nokukhubazeka, uthi umsebenzi wenkampani yakhe kukufaka iimpawu zendlela phakathi kwehilton ukuya emgungundlovu.

src: yena o thwetše batho ba 13 gomme o re projeke ye e fetotše maphelo a bona.
tgt: uqeshe abantu abalishumi eline sithathu kwaye uthi le projekthi ibutshintshile ubomi babo.

src: "bjalo ka batho bao ba phelago ka bogolofadi, re bontšhitše gore re a kgona.
tgt: "njengabantu abaphila nenkubazeko, sizibonakalisile ukuba nathi siyakwazi ukusebenza njengamntu wonke.

src: re a šoma," gwa realo jijana.
tgt: asisaxhomekekanga kwizibonelelo nje kwaphela," utshilo ujijana.

src: molaodi wa mananeo ka sanral n3, tsepo matekane, o re khamphani ya gabo e netefaditše gore dipersente tše 30 tša mošomo di fiwa dikhamphani tša kgauswi tšeo di nago le bokgoni bja go aba ditirelo tša go fapafapana.
tgt: umphathi wenkqubo yakwasanral n3 utshepo matekane uthi usanral uye waqinisekisa ukuba umsebenzi okumyinge wama30% wabelwe iinkampani zasekuhlaleni ezikwaziyo ukunika iinkonzo ezahlukeneyo.

src: se se hlotše menyetla go dikha mphani tše nnyane tšeo beng ba tšona e lego baswa, batho bao ba bego ba gateletšwe peleng mmogo le basadi.
tgt: oku kudale amathuba amaninzi kumashishini amancinci aphantsi kolutsha, abantu ababesaziwa njengabahleleleki leyo kwilixa langaphambili kwakunye nabasetyhini.

src: "go na le dikhamphani tše nnyane, tša magareng le tše nnyanennyane tše 108 tšeo gabjale di šomago ka dipro jekeng tša go fapafapana," a realo.
tgt: "kungoku nje kukho amashishini amancinci, aphakathi kwakunye nalawo aqhutywa ngumntu omnye alinani la108 asebenza kwiiprojekthi ezahlukeneyo," uqhube watsho.

src: nokuthula zondi wa ingqalabutho yamalinda multipurpose trading yena o filwe konteraka ya go aba mabu le go tsenya diphaephe tša go gamola meetse.
tgt: unokuthula zondi weingqalabutho yamalinda multipurpose trading wanikwa umsebenzi wokunikezela ngomhlaba kunye nokufakela imibhobho yokufunxa amanzi.

src: yena o re khamphani ya gagwe e thwetše batho ba seswai bao ba nago le mabo kgoni, go balwa le baotledi.
tgt: uthi inkampani yakhe iqeshe abase benzi abasibhozo abanezakhono, kuquka nabaqhubi.

src: zondi o tlaleletša ka gore basadi ba na le bokgoni bja go swana le bja banna gomme khamphani ya gagwe e na le rekote ya bohlatse bja go laetša bokgoni bja yona bja kabo ya ditirelo.
tgt: uzondi wongeza ngelithi, abasetyhini nabo banabo ubuchule njengamadoda kwaye inkampani yakhe izakhele igama elihle ngokunikezela ngeenkonzo.

src: "re kwešiša bohlokwa bja nako gomme re fihlelela dinepo tša rena go netefatša gore projeke e sepela botse.
tgt: "siyakuqonda ukubaluleka kwexesha kwaye sihlangabezana nayo yonke imimiselo esiyinikiweyo eqinisekisa ukuba iprojekthi iqhuba ngokufanele kileyo.

src: re tloga re leboga monyetla wo gomme re holofela go hwetša e mengwe menyetla gore khamphani ya rena e gole go ya le ka maemo a tša boagi," a tlaleletša ka go realo.
tgt: siyalivuyela eli thuba kwaye sinethemba lokuba kusekuninzi okuzayo, ukuze inkampani yethu nayo ikwazi ukukhula ngokwamanqanaba okwakha," wongeze watsho.

src: diprojeke tše bohlokwa tša mmušo wa bosetšhaba matekane o bolela gore kaonafatšo ya kgorwana ya tshepetšo ya dithoto le diintaseteri ya durbanfree stategauteng e na le tekanyetšo yeo e ka bago dibi lione tše 26 tša diranta gomme ebile ke ye nngwe ya diprojeke tše bohlokwa tša mmušo wa bosetšhaba tša togamaano e kopantšwego yeo e tsebegago ka la sip2.
tgt: iiprojekthi ezingundoqo zikarhulumente wesizwe umatekane uthi uphuhliso lwedurbanfree stategauteng logistics and industrial corridor lunohlahlo lwabiwomali oluqikelelwa kwiibhili yoni zeerandi ezingama26 kwaye yenye yeeprojekthi zobuchule ezingundoqo ezihlanganisiweyo zikarhulumente.

src: projeke ye e tla oketša n3 ka bophara bja yona ka go oketša mekgothana go ba e mene goba e mehlano ka mahlakoreng ka moka, gomme le maphamoganomagolo a ditsela a tla be a fetotšwe go kaonafatša kelelo ya sephethephethe.
tgt: le projekthi izakwandisa in3 nge minye imizila kwicala ngalinye.

src: karolo yeo e amegilego ya n3 e be e dutše e itemogela sephethephethe se sentšhi, kudu nakong yeo bontšhi bja difatanaga di tla bego di le tseleng, ka baka la bontšhi bja dilori tša go rwala merwalo go tloga lebopong la durban di šomiša tsela ya lephefo go ya gauteng le diprofenseng tše dingwe tša ka gare ga naga.
