tgt: kwaye izakutshintsha iindlela zokungenelela ezinkulu ukuze kuphuculwe uxinano ekuhambeni kwezithuthi.

src: go bile gape le palo e ntšhi ya dikotsi tša tsela tšeo di hlotšwego ke baotledi ba dilori tša go rwala merwalo bao ba sa hlokomelego ge ba feta moo tsela e tepogago ka pejana.
tgt: kwiminyaka egqithileyo icandelo elichaphazelekayo kun3 belino kuxinana kwezithuthi, ingakumbi ngexesha leeyure apho wonke umntu esendleleni, oku kungenxa yokuba uninzi lwelori zemithwalo ezisuka kwizibuko lasethekwini zisebenzisa uhola wendlela oya egauteng nakwa manye amaphondo angaphakathi elizweni.

src: "ntle le go rarolla bothata bja sephethephethe ka go kaonafatša tshepelo ya difatanaga ka go aga mekgothana ya tlaleletšo, mpshafatšo ya n3 e tla oketša gape le polokego.
tgt: kukwakho nenani elikhulu leengozi ezindleleni ezibangelwa kukungak hathali kwabaqhubi belori ezithwele imithwalo xa beqhuba kuma jikojiko endlela.

src: makopano a ditsela ao a sa bolokegago a tla hlangwa leswa," gwa realo matekane.
tgt: "ngaphandle kokusombu lula uxinzelelo lokuxinana olwenziwa zizithuthi ngokuthi kongezwe eminye imizila, ukuphu culwa kwen3 kukwazisa nokwanda kokhuseleko.

src: sanral e fane ka dikonteraka tše tharo ka kotareng ya mafelelo ya 2021, gomme mošomo wa go aga tsela o thomile gareng ga pherekgo ng le moranang.
tgt: kwikota yokugqibela ka2021, isanral inikezele ngeekhontrakthi ezinta thu, kwaye umsebenzi wokwakha waqala phakathi kwenyanga yomqungu nekatshazimpunzi.

src: dikarolo tšeo di mpshafatšwago gabjale ke ya dikilomitara tše 19 go tloga cato ridge go ya dardanelles yeo e tsebegago ka la umlaas road; ya dikilomitara tše 26.6 go tloga phamoganong ya ditsela ya dardanelles go ya lynnfield park; le ya dikilomitara tše 30 go tloga lynnfield park go ya phamoganong ya ditsela ya ashburton.
tgt: ama candelo alungiswayo ngoku yi19 yeekhilomitha (km) ukusuka ecato ridge ukuya edardanelles, eyaziwa ngokuba yiumlaas road; icandelo leekhilomitha ezingama26.6 ukusuka kudardanelles interchange ukuya elynnfield park; kunye neekhilomitha ezingama30 ukusuka elynnfield park ukuya kwiashburton interchange.

src: matekane o hlalosa gore sip2 e tla matlafatša kgorwana ya tshepetšo ya dithoto le dinamelwa gareng ga mafelomagolo a diintaseteri ka afrika borwa, ya kaonafatša phihlelelo e kaone ya mafelo a tša thomelontle le thomelokanageng ka durban gomme ya ba ya dira gore mošomo o sepele botse kgorwaneng yeo.
tgt: umatekane ucacisa uthi isip2 iza kuqinisa ukuthuthwa kweempahla kunye nendlela yezothutho ephakathi kweendawo eziphambili zemizimveliso yasemzantsi afrika, kananjalo iphucule ukufikelela kuncedo lokuthunyelwa kwempahla kumazwe angaphandle ethekwini kunye noku nyusa ukusebenza kakuhle kwale ndlela.

src: o tlaleletša ka gore projeke ye ke karolo ya leano la tlhabollo la bosetšhaba la 2030 mmogo le leanolegolo la dinamelwa la bosetšhaba la 2050 gomme e thekga leano la kagoleswa le tsošološo ya ikonomi la mmušo.
tgt: wongeza ngelithi le projekthi iyinxalenye yesicwangciso sophuhliso sesizwe sika2030 kunye nesicwangciso esiphambili sezothutho sika2050 kwaye ixhasa isicwangciso sikarhulumente sokwakha ngokutsha nokuvuselela uqoqosho.

src: ka go realo, mmušo o ikemišeditše go tla ka lenaneo la dinamelwa leo le sepelelanago le dihlokwa tša batho bao ba phelago ka afrika borwa gomme ebile le kgontšhago batho gore ba se šomiše tšhelete e ntšhi ge ba tšea maeto.
tgt: ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, urhulumente uzimisele ukuphuhlisa inkqubo yezothutho ehambelana neemfuno zokwenyani zabantu abahlala emzantsi afrika kwaye ikwazi uku bonelela abantu abanemali encinci bakwazi ukuhamba ngeendleko ezincinci ezindleleni.

src: bjala bo ka ba kotsi bophelong bja ngwana yoo o mo imilego vukuzenzele unnamed basadi ba baimana ba na le maikarabelo a gore ba se nwe ka baka la gore bjala bo ka hlola bolwetši bjoo bo amago tlhabologo ya ngwana.
tgt: utywala bungayonakalisa impilo yomntwana wakho ongekazalwa vukuzenzele unnamed abasetyhini abakhulelweyo banoxanduva lokungaseli kuba utywala bunokubangela imeko echaphazela ukukhula komntwana ngelixa esese siswini.

src: se ke go ya ka motlatšatona wa tlhabollo ya leago, hendrietta bogopanezulu yoo a tsebagaditšego lenaneo la tshebotšo la 999 foetal alcohol spectrum disorder (fasd).
tgt: oku kuthethwe nguse kela mphathiswa wesebe lophuhliso loluntu, uhendrietta bogopanezulu, osandul' ukuphehlelela inkqubo exhasa ukulwa ne999 foetal alco hol spectrum disorder (ifasd).

src: maikemišetšo a lesolo le ke go hlohleletša ditšhaba go thuša go šireletša masea ao a sešogo a belegwa ka go ruta batho, kudu basadi bao ba lego mengwageng ya go dira bana, ka ga dikotsi tša go nwa mola ba imile goba ba nyantšha.
tgt: iinjongo zeli phulo kukukhuthaza nokufundisa uluntu ukuba luncedise ekukhuseleni iintsana ezingekazalwa, ingakumbi abasetyhini abakwiminyaka yokuzala, libafundisa ngo bungozi bokusela utywala ngethuba bekhulelwe okanye bencancisa.

src: "go bohlokwa gore basadi ka moka bao ba imilego mmogo le bao ba nyakago go bona ba belega bana bao ba phetšego botse ba efoge go nwa bjala.
tgt: "kubalulekile ukuba onke amanina akhulelweyo kunye nabo banqwenela ukubeleka abantwana abasempilweni bangaseli tywala.

src: kotsi yeo e hlolwago ke fasd ke ya go ya go ile ebile ga e dirolloge, gomme bana bao ba belegwa go ba na le bolwetši bjo ba ba le mathata ao a amago mmele le monagano," gwa realo motlatšatona bogopanezulu nakong ya tsebagatšo.
tgt: umonakalo owenziwe yifasd usisigxina kwaye awubuyiseleki mva, abantwana abazelwe bekule meko baneengxaki ngokwa semzimbeni nasengqondweni," utshilo usekela mphathiswa ubogopanezulu kumsitho wokuphehlelela eli phulo.

src: yena o tlaleleditše ka gore afrika borwa e tsebega ka go ba le bothata bja go nwa bjala kudu, gomme naga ye e gareng ga dinaga tšeo di nwago bjala gampe lefaseng.
tgt: wongeze ngelithi umzantsi afrika waziwa njenge lizwe elinengxaki yokusela, ukwelona zinga liphezulu lokusela utywala emhlabeni wonke jikelele.

src: motlatšatona bogopanezulu o sa tšwa go etela dikarolo tšeo di fapafapanego tša naga a ruta basadi ka ga dikotsi tša go nwa ba imile, e le karolo ya lesolo la 999 fasd.
tgt: njengenxalenye yephulo le999 fasd, usekela mphathiswa ubogopanezulu kutsha nje utyelele iindawo ezohlukeneyo zelizwe, efundisa amanina ngobungozi bokusela utywala ngethuba ekhu lelwe.

src: ge a be a le boitekong ka rustenburg ka profenseng ya leboabodikela, o boditše badudi ba fao gore maemo a tšhomišompe ya bjala ka lekeišeneng leo a a tšhoša.
tgt: ngethuba ebeseboitekong erustenburg emntla ntshona, uxelele abahlali ukuba liyakhwanxhisa izinga lokuselwa kakhulu kotywala kule lokishi.

src: moimana wa kgwedi tše nne yoo gape e lego modudi wa boiketlong, basetsana tlalang (28), yoo a tsenetšego le lengwe la masolo, o rile o lesitše go nwa ka botlalo ge a se no lemoga gore o imile, gomme a be a re o tsenela disešene tša tshedimošo ya pele ga pelego kliniking.
tgt: owasetyhini oneenyanga ezine ekhulelwe nokwangumhlali waseboitekong, ubasetsana tlalang (28), obezimase elinye lala ma phulo, uthi wayeka kwaphela ukusela utywala emva kokuva ukuba ukhulelwe kwaye uthi uhamba iiseshoni ezifundisa ngolwazi lwangaphambi kokubeleka ekliniki.

src: yena o hlohleleditše baimana ba bangwe go lesa gonabjale go nwa bjala le go lesa go šomiša diokobatši.
tgt: ubongoze nabanye oomama abakhulelweyo ukuba bayeke kwangoko ukusela utywala nokusebenzisa iziyobisi xa befumana iindaba zokuba bakhulelwe.

src: go lwela go aga afrika borwa ye e laetšago tlhompho go ditokelo tša botho vukuzenzele unnamed ka la 12 lewedi 1977, stephen bantu biko o ile a hlokofala a le kgolegong ya pretoria central.
tgt: umzabalazo wokubuyisa ubuntu emzantsi afrika vukuzenzele unnamed ngomhla we12 kweyomsintsi 1977, ustephen bantu biko wasweleka eselugcinweni lwamapolisa kwintolongo enkulu ekumbindi wasepitoli.

src: seriti sa motho, e lego kokwane yeo e bego e le pelong ya bolwelatokologo bja gagwe bja phahlogo ya bathobaso, o ile a se tingwa.
tgt: kodwa ke yena wasweleka engakhange ayingcamliswe incindi yokunikwa isidima somntu, lo kwakungowona mongo womgaqomthetho owawuphembelela ubutshantliziyo bakhe obabukhuthaza isidima somntu omnyama.

src: ka mantšu a ramolao wa lapa, sir sydney kentridge, lehu la gagwe e bile "le sehlogo la bodutu godimo ga mmetse lebatong la leswika ka seleng ya kgolego".
tgt: ngokwamazwi egqwetha losapho luka biko, umhlekazi usydney kentridge, wathi "ukufa kuka biko yayikukufa okwakubuhlungu, ukufa komntu owayesele elilolo eliqhaqhazela amazinyo lodwa lilele phezu kwemethi ebandayo eyondlalwe phezu komgangatho wesisele sento longo owawubanda okwelitye lomkhekce".

src: e sa dutše e le tiragalo ya masetlapelo le ka morago ga mengwaga ye ka moka ge re gopola gore steve biko o be a na le mengwaga e 30 feela ge a hlokofala.
tgt: kunanamhla oku kuya kuhlala kungumthombo ompompoza usizi olukhulu kuyo yonke le minyaka, ukukhumbula ukuba usteve biko wasweleka eneminyaka engama30 kuphela nje qha ubudala.

src: bophelo bja gagwe bo ile bja fedišwa ke bao ba bego ba tšhaba maatla le kwalakwatšo ya dikgopolo tša gagwe tša boitokollo mmogo le maitekelo a gagwe a go hlahlelela banna le basadi ba bathobaso ka boikgantšho le seriti.
tgt: isibane sakhe sobomi saci nywa ngaphambi kwexesha ngabo babesoyika amandla kunye nefuthe lokuvakala kweengcamango zakhe zokuzikhulula kwakunye neenzame zakhe zokuxhobisa amadoda namabhinqa amnyama ukuba azingce ngobu bona kunye nesidima sawo.

src: nakong ya go phela ga gagwe ga sa ka a bona seo a bego a se bitša ‘sefoka sa go phadima’, e lego boitemogelo bja botho bja nnete.
tgt: akazange akubone ebomini bakhe oko wayesakukubiza ngokuba ‘libhaso elimenye zelayo’, ukuqondwa kobuntu bokwenene.

src: ge a be a ngwala ka kgopolo ye, o ile a bolela mantšu a a go tuma: "ge nako e dumela re tlo ba seemong seo re kgonago go fa afrika borwa mpho e botsebotse ka moo go kgonegago, e lego sefa hlego sa go laetša botho.
tgt: ebhala ngalo mbono, waba ngundaba mlonyeni xa wayesithi: "ekuhambeni kwexesha siza kukwazi ukunika umzantsi afrika esona sipho sikhulu sinokubakho – ubuntu."

src: "ge re se no thopa tokologo ka 1994, re kwešišitše gore tokelo ya go bouta ke ye nngwe ya dikarolo tša ntwa ya rena ya go lwela seriti sa motho.
tgt: xa sasifumana inkululeko yethu ngo1994, saye saqonda ukuba ilungelo lokuvota liyenye inxalenye nje yomza balazo wethu wokubuyiselwa kwesidima somntu.

src: mengwaga e 28 re le ka gare ga demokrasi, re lebagane le ditlhotlo tše ntšhi tše bjalo ka bodiidi, tlhokego ya mešomo le go se lekalekane.
tgt: kwiminyaka engamashumi amabini anesibhozo singcamla kulawulo lwethu lwentando yesininzi, sijongene nemingeni emininzi, efana nentlupheko, intswelangqesho nokungalingani.

src: ka baka la seo, re fela re palelwa ke go bona gore re tšwa kgole bjang ge go etla phethagatšong ya diko kwane tšeo molaotheo wa rena o theilwego go tšona gomme ebile di sepelelanago thwii le dikgopolo le dithuto tša steve biko.
tgt: ngenxa yoko, side sizifumane sele silibele ukujonga ukuba mngakanani na umgama esele siwuhambile wokufe zekisa umgaqosiseko wethu osekelwe phezu kwemithethosiseko eyayibethelelwe ziingcinga neemfundiso zikasteve biko.

src: ka 1977 mmušo wa pelo e mpe o bolaile yo mongwe wa batho bao ba bego ba laetša boetapele ka go mo tima dijo, meetse le kalafo yeo a bego a e hloka ka tšhoganetšo ka baka la go bethwa ošoro ke maphodisa a mmušo wa kgethollo.
tgt: ngo1977, urhulumente ongenantliziyo nowayexhu zula imikhala ngelo xesha, wabulala enye yeenkokeli zelizwe lethu ezazinenkamva eliqaqambileyo ngokuyivimba ukutya, amanzi kunye nonyango eyayilufuna ngokukhawuleza ngenxa yezivubeko zokubethwa kabuhlungu ngamapolisa ocalucalulo.

src: morago ga mengwaga e 20, kahlolong ya 1997, kgoro tsheko ya molaotheo e boletše gore go phethagatša ditokelo tša motheo tša modudi yo mongwe le yo mongwe gape le go lwela go fihlelela ditokelo tša bona tša leago le ikonomi ke kokwanekgolo ya setšhaba sa go phela ka demokrasi seo se nepilego go tsošološa seriti seo se se lobilego.
tgt: kwiminyaka engamashumi amabini emva kwesi sithwakumbe, kwisigwebo sango1997, inkundla yomgaqosiseko yagweba ngelithi ukuzalisekisa amalu ngelo asisiseko ommi ngamnye kunye nokuzama ukufezekisa amalungelo ommi ngamnye entlaloqoqosho luphawu loluntu olubonisa intando yesininzi olunjongo yalo ikukuhlangula isidima somntu esasisele silahlekile.

src: lehono ka mo afrika borwa re tšwela pele go šoma go phethagatša ditokelo tša motheo tša moafrika borwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe gore a kgone go phela bophelo bja boleng bja go hloka malwetši, tlala le bohloki.
tgt: nanamhla oku emzantsi afrika, siyaqhubeka nokuse benzela ukuzalisekisa amalungelo asisiseko omntu ngamnye wasemzantsi afrika ukuze aphile ubomi obusemgangathweni obungenazifo, indlala nokuswela.

src: mebušo ya go latelana ya demokrasi e phethagaditše melao ya go tsošološa seriti seo se lobilwego sa bontšhi bja badudi ba ka mo nageng ka go aba thuto, tlhokomelo ya maphelo, dintlo le ditirelo tša motheo.
tgt: ulawulo lwalo rhulumente wentando yesininzi ngo kulandelanayo luphumeze imigaqonkqubo yokuhlangula isidima esilahlekileyo soninzi lweli lizwe ngokuthi lubonelela ngemfundo, ukhathalelo lwempilo, izindlu kunye neenkonzo ezisisiseko.

src: lehono ka mo afrika borwa thuto ya go tšea botse ke tokelo ya motheo.
tgt: namhlanje emzantsi afrika, imfundo ekwinqanaba eliphukcukileyo ililungelo elisisiseko.

src: mmušo o beeletša ka kaonafatšong ya thuto ya digotlane e le ge o thekga dinepo tša go ithuta tša badudi ba ka nageng ba bannyanennyane, gomme ebile o fana ka kimollo ya leago ka mokgwa wa mananeo a phepo dikolong go netefatša gore barutwana ba bannyane ba fihlelela dinepo tše kaonekaone ka moo go kgonegago.
tgt: urhulumente utyala imali kuphuhliso lwabantwana kwisigaba esisaqalisa imfundo, oku ukwenza ngelokuxhasa iziphumo ezintle zokufunda kubemi bethu abangabona baselula, kwaye ukwabo nelela ngohlangulo loluntu ngeenkqubo zokutyisa abantwana ezikolweni ukuqinisekisa ukuba aba fundi abaselula bayakwazi ukufumana ezona ziphumo zibhetele kangangoko banako.

src: ka sekhwama sa bosetšhaba sa thušo ya tšhelete go baithuti (nsfas) mmogo le mehuta e mengwe ya dithekgo tša go tšwa go mmušo, diketekete tša baswa ba maafrika borwa go tšwa malapeng a go ihlokela di kgonne go ba dingaka, boramolao, barutiši, borasaense, diathisene le baipereki.
tgt: ngenkqubo yesizwe yoncedo lwezezimali yabafundi kunye nezinye iindlela ezahlukeneyo zenkxaso karhulumente, amawakawaka abantu abatsha basemzantsi afrika abaphuma kumakhaya angathathi ntweni baye bakwazi ukuba ngoogqirha, amagqwetha, ootishala, izazinzulu, amagcisa kunye noosomashishini.

src: mmušo o thekga badudi bao ba ihlokelago ebile ba sa bolokegago ka mananeo a polokego ya leago gomme ebile o fana ka menyetla ya mešomo ka mananeo a setšhaba a thwalo ya batho ba bantšhi.
tgt: urhulumente uyabaxhasa abemi abasokolayo nabasemngciphekweni ngokusebenzisa iindlela eziluqilima eziqinisekisa ukubonelelwa koluntu, kwaye ubonelela ngamathuba emi sebenzi amaninzi ngokuvula iinkqubo ezininzi zokuqeshwa koluntu.

src: ka afrika borwa ya kgatelelo yeo steve biko a hlokofaletšego ka go yona, tokologo ya polelo e be e ileditšwe gomme bolwelatokologo bja dipolotiki bo be bo dira gore motho a golegwe goba a kwešwe bohloko le go feta fao.
tgt: kumzantsi afrika wengcinezelo usteve biko owasweleka ephila kuwo, inkululeko yokuthetha yayinemida nemimiselo, kwaye xa ulitshantliziyo lezopolitiko wawuye uzitsa lele amanzi ngomsele, kuba kaloku wawuvalelwa okanye ufumane isohlwayo esiqatha nangakumbi.

src: lehono ka mo afrika borwa baswa bao ba lego mengwageng yeo steve a bego a le go yona, le ba mengwaga ya ka tlase ga yeo, ba di goga pele tšweletšongpele ya merero yeo e lego kgauswi le pelo tša bona, gomme ba kgona go kopana ntle le go tlaišwa goba go iletšwa.
tgt: namhlanje emzantsi afrika, abantu abatsha abakule minyaka wayekuyo usteve biko abanye bade bangaphantsi, bahamba phambili kubutshantliziyo bezabalazela izizathu ezihambelana neemfuno zobomi babo, kwaye bayakwazi ukuququzelela iindibano ngaphandle kokungcungcuthekiswa okanye ukugxothwa.

src: tokologo ya polelo le ya gore motho a be karolo ya seo a se ratago, tokelo ya go gwanta mmogo le tokelo ya tekatekano pele ga molao di ama bohle.
tgt: inkululeko yokuthetha nokunxulumana, ilungelo lokuqhankqalaza kunye nelungelo lokulingana phambi komthetho lifunyanwa ngumntu wonke.

src: bjalo ka naga, re tšwa kgole ge go etla phethagatšong ya seriti sa motho, e lego kokwane yeo steve biko a bego a e rata kudu.
tgt: njengelizwe, sele sihambe umgama omde ekufezekiseni ukuhlangulwa kwesidima somntu, nekungeyona nto owayeyixabisile kakhulu usteve biko.

src: le ge go le bjalo, re sa na le leeto le letelele leo re tlo le tšeago.
tgt: ukanti ke, usemde nomgama ekusafu neka siwuhambile.

src: go hloka mošomo, go hloka ntlo, mohlagase, meetse a pompi, go hloka naga, go hloka mabokgoni goba menyetla, go dira gore dimilione tša maafrika borwa di palelwe ke go fihlelela maphelo ao ba a nyakago ebile a ba swanelago.
tgt: ngaphandle kwemisebenzi, ngaphandle kwendlu, umbane okanye amanzi, ngaphandle komhlaba, ngaphandle kwe zakhono okanye amathuba, izigidi zabemi bomzantsi afrika zisavinjwe ubomi ezi bufunayo nezibufaneleyo.

src: ke ka fao mmušo o šomago le bašomišanimmogo go tša leago go aga ikonomi yeo e akaretšago, go hlola mešomo, go kgontšha di kgwebo go gola, gape le go lwa le bodiidi le tlala.
tgt: yiyo loo nto urhulumente esebenzi sana namahlakani kwezentlalo ukwakha uqoqosho olubanda kanyayo, ukudala amathuba emisebenzi, ukwenza ukuba amashishini aphumelele kwaye alwe nentsokolo nendlala.

src: lenaneo la matlafatšo le buša kholofelo owen mngadi lenaneo la matlafatšo ya batšwasehlabelo la thohoyandou (tvep) le lwela go bušetša kholofelo le boitshepo ka gare ga lenaneo la toka ka mananeo a lona a go tsenelela ao maikemišetšo a ona e lego go thuša baphologi ba dikgaruru tša go thewa godimo ga bong (gbv) le ba go katwa ka go ba fa ditirelo tša monagano le tša leago.
tgt: inkqubo yokuxhotyiswa kwamaxhoba ibuyisela ithemba owen mngadi inkqubo yokuxhotyi swa kwamaxhoba asethohoyandou (itvep) izama ukubuyisela ithemba kwinkqubo yobulungisa ngamaphulo ayo angqingqwa ajolise ekuncedeni amaxhoba obundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini (igbv) kunye no dlwengulo ngokuwabonelela ngeenkonzo zeengcebiso ngokwasengqondweni.

src: tvep e thomile ka limpopo mengwaga ya ka godimo ga ye 20, gomme e šomela ka dipetlele tša donald fraser le tshilidzini ka fase ga mmasepala wa selegae wa thulamela.
tgt: itvep eyasekwa elimpopo kwiminyaka engama20 eyadlulayo, isebenza kwizibhe dlele zasetshilidzini nasedonald fraser phantsi ko masipala wasekhaya wasethulamela.

src: molaodimogolo wa tvep wa motšwaoswere, fhatuwani manthada, o re maikemišetšo a yona ke go hlohleletša maikutlo a go se amogele tlaišo ya thobalano, ya gbv le tlaišo ya bana magareng a badudi ba thohoyandou, ka lebaka la gore ditiragalo tše ke tše ntši kudu ka tikologong ye.
tgt: umlawuli obambeleyo ufhatuwani manthada uthi le nkqubo ijolise ekuwusiphu leni kungasali nengcambu umkhwa wokuhlasela ngokwesondo, igbv kunye nokuxhatshazwa kwabantwana kubahlali basethohoyandou, oku ngenxa yokuba la matyala axhaphakile kulo mmandla.

src: o re mo nakong ye e fetilego, dipalopalo tša bosenyi di be di tle di laetše gore go na le melato ye mentši ya go katwa ka thohoyandou, eupša tvep e tšeere magato a mantši mo go oketšeng temošo le go fa ditirelo tša thobamatswalo ya letšhogo go thibela thogako ye.
tgt: uthi kwixesha langaphambili, amanani olwaphulomthetho ayebonisa ukuba maninzi amatyala odlwengu lo ethohoyandou, kodwa itvep yenze imitsi emikhulu ekufundiseni, nasekunqa ndeni lo mkhuba eluntwini, nasekuboneleleni ngeenkonzo zokucebisa ngokwasengqo ndweni kwixhoba elisothuki leyo.

src: ka ge lefase le tla be le keteka lesolo la ntwa ya matšatši a 16 a tlhokego ya dintwa kgahlanong le basadi le bana go tloga ka 25 dibatsela go fihla go 10 manthole, mathanda o re lenaneo le kgotsofaditše kgatelopele ye e dirilwego ka go hlohleletša badudi go kwešiša ditokelo tša bona le go bega bosenyi.
tgt: njengoko ihlabathi liza kube liqwalasela iphulo leentsuku ezili16 zokungaxhatshazwa kwabasetyhini nabantwana ukusuka ngomhla wama25 kweyenkanga ukuya kowe10 kweyomnga, umanthada uthi le nkqubo yanelisekile yinkqubela esele yenziwe yokukhuthaza abahlali ukuba baqonde amalungelo abo kwaye baxele nezenzo zolwaphulomthetho.

src: "tvep e amogela batšwasehlabelo ba dikgaruru tša ka malapeng ba palo ya gare ga 80 le 100 kgwedi ye nngwe le ye nngwe, mola melato ya go katwa ye 45 go fihla go 50 e begwa kgwedi ye nngwe le ye nngwe," go bolela manthada.
tgt: "itvep yamkela amaxhoba aphakathi kwama80 ukuya kwi100 odushe lwasekhaya nyanga nganye, ngelixa amatyala odlwengulo angama45 ukuya kuma50 nawo axelwa ngenyanga," utsho umanthada.

src: disenthara tša ditirelo ka moka tša lenaneo di fa batšwasehlabelo ditirelo tša go fapanafapana, go akaretšwa go fihlelela thušo ya semolao, tšhireletšo ya batšwasehlabelo kgahlanong le batshwenyi, tlhokomelo ya melato ya kgorotsheko, thobamatswalo le matlafatšo ka tlhabollo ya bokgoni, bjalo se se fa batšwasehlabelo sebaka sa go thoma ka boswa.
tgt: amaziko enkqubo anikezela ngeenkonzo ezahlukeneyo kumaxhoba, kubandakanywa ukufikelela kuncedo lwezomthetho, ukukhuselwa kwamaxhoba kubenzi bobubi, ukujongwa kwamatyala ezi nkundleni, iingcebiso kunye nokuxhotyiswa ngophuhliso lwezakhono, ngaloo ndlela ke le nkqubo inika amaxhoba isiqalo esitsha.

src: manthada o bolela gore tvep e šomišana kudu le tirelo ya afrika borwa ya sephodisa, kgoro ya maphelo le kgoro ya tlhabollo ya leago go thibela letšhogo la morago ga tlaišo la batšwasehlabelo ba ba swaraganego le go bula molato.
tgt: umanthada uthi itvep isebenzisana ngokusondeleleneyo nenkonzo yesipolisa yomzantsi afrika, isebe leze mpilo kunye nesebe lophu hliso loluntu ukuthintela uku phathwa kakubi kwamaxhoba ityeli lesibini xa ekwinkqubo yokuvula ityala.

src: "mo melatong ya go katwa, bašomi ba tlhokomelo ya maphelo le maphodisa ba tla disenthareng tša tvep go thuša batšwasehlabelo gore ba bule melato ya bosenyi kgahlanong le batshwenyi gomme gape, go fa ditirelo tša thobamatswalo," a realo.
tgt: "kumatyala odlwengulo, abasebenzi bezempilo kunye namapolisa beza kumaziko etvep ukuzakunceda ama xhoba ukuba avule amatyala olwaphulomthetho avulele abophulimthetho kwaye ba phinde babonelele ngeenkonzo zoluleko ngokwasengqo ndweni," utshilo.

src: tvep e amogela batšwasehlabelo ba go fihla go matšatši a 14, efela, peakanyo e ka katološwa mo go melato yeo e akaretšago bana le lapa ka moka.
tgt: itvep ihlalisa amaxhoba ukuya kutsho kwiintsuku ezili14, nangona kunjalo, ulungiselelo linokwandiswa kwiimeko ezibandakanya usapho lonke okanye aba ntwana.

src: "re na le masolo a go hlahlelela badudi ka tsebo ao ka ona re boledišanago le setšhaba le go ruta batho ka ditokelo tša bona.
tgt: "sinomanyano lokuxhobisa, oluqhuba iingxoxo zoluntu kwaye lufundise abantu ngamalungelo abo.

src: re thuša badudi ba go feta milione ba thohoyandou le ba metse ye mengwe ya kgauswi.
tgt: sinceda abahlali abangaphezu kwesigidi abasuka ethohoyandou nakwiindawo ezisingqongi leyo.

src: re kgonne go bušetša kholofelo gomme bjale batho ba na le tshepo mo go lenaneo la toka ka lebaka la ka fao re amanago ka gona le maphodisa," a realo.
tgt: sikwazile ukubuyisela ithemba kwinkqubo yobulungisa nokulawulwa kolwaphulomthetho ngenxa yobudlelwane bethu namapolisa," utshilo.

src: tvep gape e hlotše mešomo ya batho ba 44 setheong sa yona bao ba šomelago dikgo ro tša yona tša go fapana go swana le ya ditšhelete, ya merero ya bašomi le ya tekolo.
tgt: itvep ikwadale amathuba engqesho kubantu abangama44 abasebenza kumasebe awohlukeneyo afana nelezemali, alabasebenzi kunye novavanyo.

src: ka ntle le go amogela thekgo ya ditšhelete ye e tšwelago pele ya r90 000 ka kotara go tšwa go kgoro ya tlhabollo ya leago ya limpopo, tvep e amilwe ke covid19 ka ge bathekgi ka ditšhelete ba bantši ba ikgogetše morago, bjalo se se amile gampe ditshepedišo tša mošomo tša mokgatlo.
tgt: nangona le nkqubo ifumana inkxasomali ye r90 000 rhoqo ngekota kwisebe lophuhliso lwentla lo laselimpopo, itvep yachatshazelwa yicovid19 njengoko abaxhasi ngezimali baye barhoxa, nto leyo echaphazela kakubi iinkqubo zokusebenza zalo mbutho.

src: bjalo, sekhwama sa karabo sa dikgaruru tša go thewa godimo ga bong le polao ya basadi, seo se thakgotšwego ke mopresidente cyril ramaphosa, gotee le foramo ya boditšhabatšhaba ya basadi ya afrika borwa le balekani ba leago ka dibokwane ngwaga wo, se thušitše lenaneo le.
tgt: kodwa ke nangona kunjalo, ingxowamali yokusabela ubundlobongela obusekwe kwisini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini (igbvf), eyaphehlelelwa ngumo ngameli ucyril ramaphosa kweyomdumba kulo nyaka, kunye neqonga lamazwe ngamazwe lamakhosikazi omzantsi afrika kunye namahlakani asekuhlaleni ayincedile kakhulu le nkqubo.

src: tvep e magareng a sehlopha sa mathomo sa mekgatlo yeo e lwantšhago gbvf, go amogela thekgo ya ditšhelete.
tgt: itvep yayiphakathi kweqela lokuqala lemibutho elwa negbvf, ukufumana inkxasomali.

src: ka palomoka ya r128 milione yeo e kgobokeditšwego ka dithušo tša lekala la poraebete, sekhwama sa makala a mantši, sekhwama sa gbvf se tla thuša le go thekga phethagatšo ya leanotiro la bosetšhaba la gbvf.
tgt: ngesixamali ser128 lezigidi esathi saqokelelwa ngeminikelo esuka kwicandelo labucala, ingxowamali yamacandelo amaninzi, ingxowamali yegbvf iza kunceda kwaye ixhase ukuphunyezwa kwesicwa ngcisoqhinga sesizwe segbvf.

src: tvep e abetšwe r250 000 ngwaga wo gomme e tla amogela thekgo ye nngwe ya ditšhelete ya 2023. manthada o re ditšhelete tša thekgo di kgontšhitše tvep go fihlelela batšwasehlabelo ba bantši le go dira gore mo kgatlo o tšwelepele go šoma.
tgt: itvep yabelwe ir250 000 kulo nyaka umiyo kwaye iza kufumana enye inkxasomali ngo2023.

src: murendeni vhengani (26) ke mophologi yoo a phološitšwego ke tvep lesoganeng leo a bego a ratana le lona leo le bego le mo tshwenya.
tgt: umanthada uthi le nkxasomali yenze ukuba itvep ikwazi ukufikelela kumaxho ba amaninzi kwaye igcine lo mbutho usebenza.

src: yena le ngwana wa gagwe wa mengwaga ye mene ba dutše sebaka sa dikgwedi tše 46 mo senthareng ya tvep .
tgt: uchithe iinyanga ezingama46 nentombi yakhe eneminyaka emine ubudala kweli ziko.

src: senthara ye e mo thušitše go bula melato kgahlanong le lesogana le gape le go le bulela taelo ya tšhireletšo.
tgt: eli ziko limncedile ukuba amvulele amatyala lo waye sakuba liqabane lakhe kwaye wafaka nomyalelo wokhuseleko.

src: lesogana le le ka se sebaka le sa seka.
tgt: ityala lisachotshelwe.

src: "ba nkamogetše ka diatla tše borutho ka morago ga mengwaga ye mentši ya go tshwenywa.
tgt: "bandamkela ngezandla ezishushu emva kweminyaka emininzi yokubandezeleka.

src: ke kwele ke bolokegile.
tgt: kwaye ndaziva ndikhuse lekile.

src: dikgopelo tša nsfas tša 2023 di buletšwe vukuzenzele unnamed saekele ya dikgopelo ya 2023 ya sekema sa bosetšhaba sa thušo ya ditšhelete (nsfas) e buletšwe.
tgt: ukufakwa kwezicelo zensfas ka2023 kuvuliwe vukuzenzele unnamed ukufakwa kwesicelo senkxasomali yonyaka ka2023, yenkqubo yesizwe yoncedo lwezemali (insfas) sele kuvuliwe.

src: tona ya kgoro ya thuto ya godingwana, saense le boithomelo, ngaka blade nzimande, o tsebišitše malobanyana ka nako ya kopano ya bobegaditaba.
tgt: umphathiswa wemfundo ephakamileyo, inzululwazi nokusungula izinto ezintsha, ugq blade nzimande, wenze esi sibhengezo ngethuba ebethetha noonondaba, kutsha nje.

src: tona nzimande o re sekema se tšeere sephetho sa go bulela nako ya dikgopelo ka pela, ge go bapetšwa le ngwagola, go fa bakgopedi ba ka moso nako ye e lekanego ya go romela dikgo pelo tša bona le ditokomane tša thekgo.
tgt: umphathiswa unzimande uthi kugqitywe kwelo kuba kulo unyaka umjikelo wezicelo uvulwe kwangethuba, kungafani nonyaka ophelileyo, ukuze kunikwe abo baza kuba ngabafakizicelo ixesha elaneleyo lokungenisa izicelo zabo kunye namaxwebhu athunye lwa nezicelo.

src: ge a e fa pego ya bjalebjale mabapi le thekgo ya ditšhelete ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2022 wa nsfas, tona nzimande o re tekanetšo ya r43 milione e abetšwe sekema go lefa ditefišo tša baholegi ba thuto, go akaretšwa dijo le putseletšo ya senamelwa, le dimatheriale tša thuto.
tgt: enika ingxelo ehlaziyiweyo ngenkxasomali yensfas yonyaka wokufunda ka2022, umphathiswa unzimande uthi uhlahlo lwabiwomali oluzibhiliyoni ezingamar43 lwabelwa esi sikimu ngelokulungiselela iimali zokufunda zabaxhamli, eziquka ukutya nesibonelelo sokuhamba, kunye nezixhobo zokufunda.

src: o re dikgopelo tše 985 672 di amogetšwe gomme go tšwa go tšona tše 140 636 ga se tša atlega.
tgt: uthi zizicelo ezingama985 672 ezifunyenweyo, zekwathi ezingama140 636 zona zanga phumeleli.

src: go dikgopelo tše di amogetšwego, tše 739 526 di amogetšwe nakwana go thekga ka ditšhelete boingwadišo bjo bo sa letetšwego gore bo feleletšwe go tšwa diinstitšhušeneng tša go fapana.
tgt: kwizicelo ezifunyenweyo, zingama739 526 izicelo ezavunywa okwethutyana ngelixa kusalindwe ukubhalisa kumaziko ngamaziko.

src: "bontši bja bakgopedi ba ba sego ba atlega ba šitilwe go fa bohlatse bjo bo lekanego bja thekgo ya ditšhelete; ba bangwe ba feta magomo a maswanedi; ge ba bangwe bona ba šetše ba fihleletše maemo a godimodimo a lengwalo la thuto ao nsfas e a thekgago ka ditšhelete gomme maemo a bona ga a sa ba kgontšha go latela dinyakwa tša go ka tsenela thuto ya lekala la kholetše ya tvet," tona nzimande o a hlalosa.
tgt: "uninzi lwabafakizicelo abangaphumelelanga basilela ukunika ubungqina obaneleyo obuxhasa izicelo zabo; ngenxa yokuba bayegqitha kumda wokufaneleka ukufumana inkxasomali; mhlawumbi umceli sele efumene elona nqanaba liphezulu lesiqinisekiso esixhaswa ngunsfas okanye ukungahambelani nama khondo emfundo yecandelo leekholeji zetvet," ucacise watsho umphathiswa unzimande.

src: go ya ka tshedimošo ye e lego weposaeteng ya nsfas, go tloga ka ngwaga wa thuto wa 2021, nsfas ga e sa thekga dithuto tša thuto ya morago ga tikrii ya mathomo ka ditšhelete.
tgt: ngokweenkcukacha ezikwiwebhusayithi yensfas, ukusukela kunyaka wezifundo ka2021, insfas ayisaboneleli ngenkxasomali yezifundo zabasele benezidanga.

src: se se akaretša ditifikeiti tša thuto ya morago ga tikrii ya mathomo, didiploma tša thuto ya morago ga tikrii ya mathomo, ditikrii tša honase, ditikrii tša mastase le phd.
tgt: oku kuquka isetifikethi sasemva kwesidanga, idiploma yasemva kwesidanga sokuqala, izidanga zehonours, imasters kunye nezidanga zephd.

src: se se ra gore lengwalo la thuto la godimodimo leo sekema se le thekgago ka ditšhelete ke tikrii ya mathomo.
tgt: oku kuthetha ukuba eyona mfundo ikwinqanaba eliphezulu exhaswa ngemali yale nkqubo lansfas yeyesidanga sebachelor’s degree.

src: go kaonafatša mokgwa wa dikgopeloka maiteko a go kaonafatša mokgwa wa yona wa go dira dikgopelo le tshepedišo ya tšona go dira gore e be wo mokaonekaone go šomišwa ke bakgopedi bao ba nyakago go dira dikgopelo, tona nzimande o re ngwaga wo, nsfas e dirile diphetogo tše mmalwa tša go kaonafatša mokgwa wo go kgonthišiša gore badiradikgopelo ba se itemogele mathata.
tgt: ukuphucula inkqubo yokufaka izicelongelinge lokuphucula inkqubo yokufakwa kwezicelo kunye nokwenza izinto lula kwabo baza kube befaka izicelo, umphathiswa unzimande uthi kulo nyaka, insfas iphumeze izinto eziliqela eziphucule le nkqubo ngelokuqinisekisa ukuba ukufaka isicelo akunawo amagingxigingxi.

src: o re weposaete ya go dira dikgopelo ka inthanete ya nsfas e bopilwe leswa gore e šomišege botse go feta peleng le go dira gore e nyake go swana le dipolatefomo tše dingwe tšeo bakgopedi bao ba nyakago go dira dikgopelo ba di tlwaetšego go swana le whatsapp, twitter, facebook le instagram.
tgt: uthi inkqubo yensfas yokufaka izicelo ngeintanethi yenziwe ngokutsha ukuze isebenziseke ngakumbi kwaye isondele nakwamanye amaqonga aqhelekileyo kwabo bafaka izicelo afana nowhatsapp, itwitter, ifacebook noinstagram.

src: "tshepedišo ya dikgopelo ka boyona e nolofaditšwe gomme dipotšišo tše di botšišitšwego di bonolonyana gore di kwešišwe ke setšhaba.
tgt: "inkqubo yesicelo ngokwayo yenziwe lula kwaye imibuzo ebuzwayo kulula ukuba uluntu luyiqonde.

src: go tlaleletša, bakgo pedi ba ka kgaotša tshepedišo ya dikgopelo gomme ba tšwela pele ka morago ga sebaka ka ntle le go thoma ka leswa, selo seo se bego se sa kgonege mo dinakong tša go feta, o realo.
tgt: ukongezelela, abafakizicelo ngoku banga kwazi ukuma bayeke pha kathi ze baphinde baqhubeke kwakhona kwixesha elizayo ngaphandle kokuphinda baqalise phantsi, nekuyinto eyayingakwazi ukwenzeka kwixesha langaphambili, utshilo.

src: "ka godimo ga dikaonafatšo tše di dirilwego, nsfas e okeditše mekgwa ya theknolotši ya go dira dikgopelo go dira gore badiradikgopelo ka go fapana ga bona ba kgone go dira dikgopelo, gape re be re lebeletše gore bontši bja batho bao ba tlago dira dikgopelo ke baswa bao ba ratago go dira dilo ka theknolotši," tona nzimande a tlaleletša.
tgt: "ngaphezulu kolu phuculo, insfas iphuhlise iindlela ezongezelelekileyo zokufaka izicelo ukulungiselela abafakizicelo abasuka kwiimvelaphi ezahlukeneyo, kananjalo siyibeke engqondweni into yokuba uninzi lwabo baza kube befaka izicelo ngabantu abatsha abayaziyo indlela yokwenza izinto kumaqonga edijithali," kongeza umphathiswa unzimande.

src: mešomo le menyetla ya mekgwa ya boiphedi milione, gomme palo ye e sa tšwela pele go gola vukuzenzele unnamed ka fase ga mengwaga ye mebedi ya go feta, re thakgotše lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo ya mopresidente go hlola mešomo le go thekga mekgwa ya boiphedišo bjalo ka karolo ya go thekga tsošološo ya ikonomi go tšwa go leuba la covid19.
tgt: isigidi somsebenzi kunye namathuba okuziphilisa, kwaye sisaqhuba nezibalo vukuzenzele unnamed kwisithuba esinga phantsi nje kwemi nyaka emibini egqi thileyo, sasungula inkqubo kamongameli yovuselelo lwengqesho ngelokudala imisebenzi kunye nokuxha sa iindlela zokuphila njenge nxalenye yokuxhasa uku vuselelwa koqoqosho emva kobhubhani wecovid19.

src: lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo ya mopresidente le sa tšwa go atlega go fihlelela bakgathatema ba milione o tee go tloga mola le hlomilwego.
tgt: inkqubo kamongameli yovuselelo lwengqesho isanda kufikelela kwinqanaba lesigidi sabathathinxaxheba nabaxha mli ukususela oko yathi yasu ngulwa.

src: phihlelelo ye ke ka lebaka la maiteko a tšhomišano mmušong ka moka le setšhabeng ka bophara, go akaretšwa lekala la poraebete, mekgatlo ye e theilwego gare ga setšhaba le ye mengwe ye mentši.
tgt: le mpumelelo isisiphumo seenzame zentsebenziswa no kurhulumente wonke nakuluntu ngokubanzi, kuba ndakanywa icandelo labucala, imibutho esekwe kuluntu kunye nabanye abathathinkxaxheba abaninzi.

src: lenaneo le na le seabe mo go tlholo ya mešomo mola ikonomi e tšea nako go kaonafala le go hlola mešomo ka palo ye re e nyakago.
tgt: le nkqubo inegalelo ekuda lweni kwemisebenzi ngelixa uqoqosho luthatha ixesha ukuvuka nokudala imisebenzi ngokomlinganiselo esiwudingayo.

src: ge re šogana le kgolo ya ikonomi go hlola mešomo ya seriti le ya go swarelela nako ye telele ka palo ye kgolwane, re tla tšwela pele go kaonafatša katlego, lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo ya mopresidente le go dira gore e oketšega go feta pele.
tgt: njengoko sithe gqolo sicenga ukukhula koqoqosho ukuze sinikezele ngemisebenzi endilisekileyo nezinzileyo nekwinqanaba eliphezulu kakhulu, sizakube siqhubeka nokwakhela phezu kwempumelelo yenkqubo yovuselelo lwengqesho kamongameli kwaye sandise namaphiko okufikelela kwayo le nkqubo.

src: go sa nyakega kudu gore go tlaleletšwe tsošološo ya mmaraka wa mešomo.
tgt: kusafuneka kakhulu ukuxhasa iindlela zokubuyela kwakhona kwemisebenzi, kuba kaloku imisebenzi iyakwazi ukuphucula uqoqosho ngeendlela ezibalulekileyo.

src: go maemo ao e lego gore tlhokego ya bokgoni ke lepheko le legolo mo go khwetšo ya mošomo, mananeo a a fa maitemogelo a mošomo a boleng bja godimo.
tgt: kwimeko apho ukungabikho kwamava omsebenzi kungumqobo omkhulu ome phambi kwamathuba okufumana umsebenzi, ezi nkqubo zibonelela ngamava omsebenzi akumgangatho ophezulu.

src: ka gare ga lenaneo le legologolo la go thekgwa ke tlhohleletšo, mohlala, baswa ba go batamela go ba 600 000 ba thwetšwe bjalo ka bathušibadikolo ka dikolong tša ka godimo ga tše 22 000 khutlong ye nngwe le ye nngwe ya naga.
tgt: kweyona nkqubo inkulu exhaswa lolu vuselelo, umzekelo, baphantse babe ngama600 000 abantu abatsha abafakwe njengabancedisi beetitshala kwizikolo ezinga phezu kwama22 000 kwii mbombo zonke zelizwe.

src: bolaodi bja sekolo, barutiši le bakgathatema ba bangwe ka moka ba dumela gore seabe sa bathušibadikolo se kaonafaditše tikologo ya go ithuta ka dikolong.
tgt: abaphathi bezikolo, ootitshala nabanye abathathinxaxheba bonke bayavumelana ukuba igalelo labancedisi betitshala liyiphuculile imeko yemfundo ezikolweni.

src: batho ba bantši ba ba itšhomelago ba hweditše mekgwa ya bona ya boiphedišo e tsenwe bogare ke leuba.
tgt: abantu abaninzi abazisebenzayo bazibhaqa sele iphazamisekile indlela yabo yokuphila ngenxa yalo bhubhani.

src: lekala la bokgabo lona le amilwe gampe gagolo.
tgt: icandelo lobugcisa lachaphazeleka kakubi kakhu lu.

src: ka gare ga lekala le, thekgo e filwe batho gore ba ihlolele mešomo gomme ba hlolele le ba bangwe.
tgt: kweli candelo ke, abantu banikwa inkxaso ukuze bakwazi ukuzidalela imi sebenzi kunye neyabanye abantu.

src: difilimi, mmino le dipapadi tše di tšweleditšwego bjale di kgona go dira letseno le lengwe go tšwa go thekišo ya ditokelo, ditekete le diroyalethi.
tgt: ngoku iifilimu, umculo kunye nemidlalo eveliswayo eqongeni iyakwazi ukwenza ingeniso eyongezelelekileyo esuka ekuthengisweni kwamalungelo, amatikiti kunye neentlawulo.

src: tše ka moka di bile le seabe kgolong ya lekala.
tgt: konke oku kube negalelo ekukhuleni kweli candelo.

src: lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo ya mopresidente gape le thekgile mekgwa ya boiphedišo ya nako ye telele.
tgt: le nkqubo kamongameli yovuselelo lwengqesho ikwaxhase nokuphila kwabantu okuzinzileyo.

src: balemelaboiphedišo ba ka godimo ga 140 000 ba amogetše dibaotšha tša thušo ya tšweletšo go ba thuša go thoma le go oketša tšweletšo ka morago ga go tsenwa bogare ke covid19.
tgt: nga phezulu kwe140 000 yama fama alima ukutya afumene iivawutsha zemveliso uwa nceda ukuba aqalise kwa khona, kwaye andise imveliso emva kokuba ephazanyiswe yicovid19.

src: moholegi wo mongwe wo bjalo ke phindile ngcoya wa mengwaga ye 36 go tšwa richmond go la kwazulunatal.
tgt: omnye wabaxhamli abanja lo nguphindile ngcoya (36) waserichmond kwazulunatal.

src: ke o tee wa maloko a lesome a kgwebo ya temo ya lapa gomme o re baotšha ye a e amogetšego e thušitše kgwebo ye mpsha go tšwelapele le go dira poelo.
tgt: ungomnye wamalungu alishumi omasibambisane wokufama kosapho, uthi ivawutsha ayifumeneyo yance da lo masibambisane omtsha ukuba uphinde uphile kwa khona kwaye ubenengeniso.

src: lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo ya mopresidente gape le thekga dialoga, ka menyetla ya go fiwa baoki, dialoga tša saense, batsebi ba mešomo ya diatla le ba bangwe.
tgt: le nkqubo kamongameli yovuselelo lwengqesho ikwaxhasa abafundi abaphumelele imfundo yezidanga, ibonelela ngamathuba engqesho kubongi, abathweswe izidanga zesayensi, amagcisa kunye nabanye ke.

src: diyunibesithi tše masomepeditshela di thuša go thwala dialoga tše di se nago mešomo mo mešomong ye e sepelelanago le mangwalo a bona a thuto.
tgt: zidyunivesithi ezingamashu mi amabini anesithandathu ezincedisa ekufumaneleni imisebenzi abafundi abaphumeleleyo nabangaphangeliyo kwimisebenzi ehambelana noko bakufundeleyo.

src: kgoro ya saense le boithomelo e tsebišitše mananeo a saense a badudi a boithomelo a go fapana, go swana le duzi umngeni conservation trust, ye e thwalago baswa ba tikologo bjalo ka dithwadi tša tikologo (envirochamps) go matlafatša ditšhaba gore di tsošološe methopo ya tikologo ya meetse.
tgt: isebe lezenzululwazi nokusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha livelise uluhlu lweenkqubo zenzululwazi ezenzelwe abahlali, ezifana neduzi umngeni conservation trust, esele iqeshe ulutsha lwasekuhlaleni njengeenvirochamps ukuze luxhobise uluntu ngolwazi lokubuyisela kwisimo sangaphambili imithombo yamanzi yasekuhlaleni.

src: lenaneo le lengwe ka kgoro le thuša borakgwebo go hlabolla ditšhišinyo tša kgwebo ka go ikonomi ya pabalelatikologo.
tgt: enye inkqubo yeli sebe inceda oosomashishini ekuphuhliseni izindululo zokucela ukushishina kuqoqosho oluvelisa imveliso ekhupha umoya ococekileyo.

src: mananeo a mešomo ya setšhaba gape a na le khuetšo ye botse ye e lebanego mo go ditšhaba gobane a hlola mošomo go dira setho.
tgt: iinkqubo zokuqeshwa koluntu nazo zinempembelelo entle ngqo kuluntu kuba zidala umsebenzi ukuze kulungelwe abantu bonke.

src: ge go bolelwa ka lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo la mopresidente, se se akaretša go kaonafatša go ithuta ka dikolong, go kaonafatša metsemekutwana, go thekga baphologi ba dikgaruru tša go thewa godimo ga bong, pabalelo ya tikologo le go tšweletša mekgwa ye meswa ya go resaekela matlakala.
tgt: ngokubhekisele kule nkqubo kamongameli yovuselelo lwengqesho, singabandakanya ukuphucula ukufunda ezikolweni, ukuphuculwa kwamatyotyombe, ukuxhasa amaxhoba obundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini, ukulondolozwa kwendalo kunye nokusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha kusetyenziswa inkunkuma ehlaziyiweyo.

src: lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo la mopresidente le thakgotšwe go rarolla bothata bja tlhokego ya mešomo bjo bo gakaditšwego ke leuba la covid19.
tgt: inkqubo kamongameli yovuselelo lwengqesho yaphehlelelwa ukuphendula kwingxaki yentswelangqesho eye yenziwa nzulu linxeba lobhubhani wecovid19.

src: le ge e le gore leuba le ka ba le fedile, tlhoke go ya mešomo ga se e fele.
tgt: nangona ubhubhane sele uthomalele, kodwa yona intswelangqesho isekwiqondo eliphezulu.

src: letseno le le amogetšwego mananeong a lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo la mopresidente le bile matlafatšo ya ikonomi go di kgwebo tše nnyane le dikgwe bo tše e sego tša semmušo ka diikonoming tša tikologo go kgabaganya naga.
tgt: ingeniso efunyenwe kwii nkqubo zikamongameli zovuselelo lwengqesho ibe yinkuthazo kuqoqosho lwamashishini amancinane nakumashishini angekho sikweni nakuqoqosho lwase khaya nakwilizwe liphela.

src: bathušibadikolo ba ba thwetšwego ka umgungundlovu ba šomiša meputso ya bona ka umgu ngundlovu.
tgt: oku kungokuba kaloku abancedisi beetitshala abaqeshwe emgu ngundlovu imivuzo yabo bayichitha kwalapha emgu ngundlovu.

src: go bjalo le ka putsonderwater.
tgt: kananjalo kuya fana nakwiputsonderwater.

src: sebakeng sa go ba le lenaneo la gore ‘batho bao ba hlokago ba tla holega ge bao ba humilego ba huma le go feta’, tšhelete e tsenywa thwii ka gare ga diatla tša ditšhaba tšeo di e hlokago kudu.
tgt: endaweni ‘yokugqithiselwa’ imali iphinde inikwe ngqo izandla zoluntu oluyidinga kakhulu.

src: tšhelete yeo morago e dikologa mo tulong ya bona gomme morago e ‘boele e tsene go ikonomi ka bophara’.
tgt: ithi ke lento imali ke ijikeleza kwalapha ekuhlaleni kwaye ‘yonyusa’ uqoqosho ngokubanzi.

src: ke ka lebaka leo re bitšago lenaneo le gore ke la tlhohleletšo, gobane ikonomi ka moka e a holega gotee le setšhaba.
tgt: yiyo loo nto le nkqubo siyibiza ngokuba yinkuthazo, kuba uqoqosho luphela luxhamla kunye noluntu ngokubanzi.

src: ka lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya mešomo la mopresidente, re buletše enetši, boikgafo, bohlami, boithomelo le menyetla.
tgt: ngale nkqubo yovuselelo lwengqesho kamongameli, siye savula amandla ombane, ukuzinikela, ubuchule bokuyila, ukusungula izinto ezintsha kunye namathuba.

src: mo tshepedišong, re aga setšhaba seo se šomago.
tgt: kule nkqubo ke sakha uluntu olusebenzayo.

src: batho ba go feta milione o tee ba holegile thwii.
tgt: bangaphezu kwesigidi abantu abaye baxhamla ngokuthe ngqo.

src: batho ba bangwe ba bantši, ka malapeng le ka ditšhabeng tša bakgathatema, ba kwele khuetšo ya tlhohleletšo.
tgt: abantu abaninzi ingakumbi, kwiintsapho kunye noluntu lwabo baxhamlileyo, baye baziva impembelelo ezintle zenkuthazo nohlumo zale nkqubo.

src: bokamoso bja rena bo laolwa ke go hlalefišwa ga bopapimpana vukuzenzele unnamed go nale ditiragalo tše mmalwa tša kantoro ya mopresidente tša go uša pelo go feta go iketla le bana mesong.
tgt: uphuhliso lwabantwana abasaqalayo lubambe isitshixo kwikamva lethu vukuzenzele unnamed kukho imisebenzi kamongameli embalwa eyanelisayo kunokuchitha intsasa kunye nabantwana abancinane.

src: malobanyana mo ke tšwa pulong ya senthara ya tlhalefišo ya bomapimpana ya little flower (ecd) gola bizana kua kapa bohlabela fao ke ilego ka iketla le ba bangwe ba baetapele ba kamoso ba naga ya gaborena, ke ba balela le go ba theeletša.
tgt: kutshanje bendizimase ukuvulwa kweziko lophuhliso lwa bantwana abasaqalayo ilittle flower (iecd) elisebizana empuma koloni, nalapho ndithe ndachitha ixesha nezinye zeenkokeli zangomso zelizwe lethu, ndizifundela kwaye ndimamele kuzo.

src: senthara ye e satšo agwa ke mokgatlo wa tlhabollo wa impande wa ka mo afrika borwa ka thekgo ya setheo sa nelson mandela.
tgt: eli ziko lisandula ukwakhiwa ngumbutho wophuhliso onguimpande south africa ngenkxaso yenelson mandela fou ndation.

src: ke kgwathile maikutlo ke boikgafo bja bašomedi ba senthara ye ge ba thekga setšhaba le bana ba go tsena go yona.
tgt: ndichukumiseke kakhulu kukuzinikela kwabasebenzi beli ziko ekuxhaseni uluntu kunye nabantwana balo.

src: ba mpoditše tša mehleng ya ge senthara ye e thomišwa, ka fao bašomedi ba bego ba sokolela go hwetša meputso ya bona eupša ba tšwelapele go tla mošomong.
tgt: bandixelela ukuba kwii ntsuku zokuqala zeli ziko, abasebenzi bebesokola ukuhlawulwa kodwa beza emsebenzini.

src: ba mpoditše gape le gore le ge e le gore batswadi ba be ba sa kgone go lefela bana ba bona tefo ya r20, bana ba be ba sa gomišetšwe morago.
tgt: baphinde bandixelela ukuba nokuba iintsapho azikwazi uku hlawulela umntwana wazo amar20, abantwana abajikiswa.

src: boikgafo bja bašomedi ba senthara ye ya ecd bo bohlokwa kudu ka gobane disenthara tša tlhalefišo ya bomapimpana di kgatha tema ye bohlokwa kudu tlhabollong ya setšhaba sa gaborena.
tgt: ukuzinikela kwabase benzi beziko leecd ku baluleke kakhulu kuba amaziko ophuhliso lwa bantwana abasaqalayo adlala indima ebalulekileyo kuphuhliso lwesizwe sethu.

src: tšona disenthara tše di hwetšagala motsaneng wo mongwe le wo mongwe, toropong efe goba efe le ditoropong ka moka tše kgolo ka mo nageng.
tgt: la maziko anokufumaneka kuzo zonke iilali, iidolophu kunye nezixeko zelizwe.

src: bontši bja tšona di thomilwe ke basadi mo setšhabeng bao ba bego ba sala ba hlokomela bana ge batswadi ba bona ba ile mešomong.
tgt: uninzi lwaqalwa ngabasetyhini ekuhlaleni ukuxhasa abazali abafuna ukuba abantwana babo bakhathalelwe xa besemsebenzini.

src: bontši bja tšona disenthara tše di thomile e le dikretšhe goba dise nthara tša go hlokomela bana mosegare.
tgt: uninzi lwala maziko aqala njengeendawo zokugci na abantwana kunye neendawo zokhathalelo lwabantwana.

src: tše ntši tša tšona di godile mme gabjale di akaretša lenaneothuto la motheo la dithuto tša mehleng ka gare ga ditirelo tša tšona.
tgt: uninzi luye lwakhula lwaza lwanda ukuze lubandakanye ikharityhulam yokufunda esisiseko kwiinkonzo zabo.

src: bjalo ka mmušo, re tšeere mošomo wa go kaonafatša maemo a tlhokomelo le go dira gore didirišwa di be gona gore disenthara tša ecd di kgone go sepediša ditiragalo tše maleba tša bana go ba lokišetša dithuto tše dumeletšwego ke mmušo.
tgt: njengorhulumente, siwuthabathile umsebenzi wokuphucula imigangatho yokhathalelo kunye nokwenza izixhobo zifumaneke kumaziko eecd ukuze kuqhutywe imisebenzi efanelekileyo yabantwana abancinane ukubalungiselela imfundo esesikweni.

src: ka moranang 2022, re kgonne go šutiša ka botlalo tirelo ya ecd go tšwa go kgoro ya tlhabollo ya leago go ya go kgoro ya thuto ya motheo.
tgt: kutshazi mpunzi wama2022, sagqiba ukushenxisa umsebenzi weecd ukusuka kwisebe lophuhliso loluntu ukuya kwisebe lemfundo esisiseko.

src: tšhutišo ye e diretšwe go amanya tlhalefišo ya bomapimpana le lenaneothuto la dithuto tše dumeletšwego dikolong kamoka le go aba tlhahlo, thuto le tlhabollo go bašomedi disenthareng tša ecd go potologa naga.
tgt: oku kunxibelelanisa uphuhliso lwabantwana abasaqalayo nekharityhulam yesikolo esesikweni nokubonelela ngoqeqesho, imfundo nophuhliso kubasebenzi abakumaziko eecd kwilizwe jikelele.

src: ka baka la gore dithuto tše tša motheo tša bomapimpana di le bohlokwa katlegong ya ngwana morago ga mengwaga ngwaga, molaophetošwa wa melao ya thuto ya motheo wo gabjale o lego pele ga palamente o šišinya gore e be kgapeletšo go bana ka moka gore ba tsene disenthareng tša ecd tekano ya mengwaga ye mebedi pele ba thoma kreiti 1 goba wona mphato wa pele.
tgt: ngenxa yokuba le mfundo ingundoqo kwimpumelelo yomntwana kwiminyaka ezayo, umthetho osayilwayo olungisiweyo wemi thetho yemfundo esisiseko ophambi kwepalamente ngoku uphakamisa ukuba kunyanzeleke ukuba bonke abantwana bafumane iminyaka emibini yeecd phambi kokuba bangene kwibanga loku1.

src: ke gona mo fao bana ba swanetšego go rutwa, ba ithute ka meraloko le go fiwa setshola se ka bago se tee ka letšatši.
tgt: kukwesi sigaba apho abantwana kufuneka bafundiswe, bafunde ngendlela yoku dlala kwaye bafumane isidlo esinye ngosuku ubuncinane.

src: mohola wa disenthara tša go hlalefiša bomapimpa na ga se fela go thuša go lokišetša bana ba naga ya gaborena go atlega dikolong; gape di bohlokwa mo go ithomeleng kgwebo le mo go tlhomeng mešomo.
tgt: amaziko ophuhliso lwabantwana abasaqalayo akalungiseleli nje abona bemmi bancinane belizwe lethu ukuba baphumelele esikolweni; akwangumthombo obalulekileyo woshishino nokudala imisebenzi.

src: disenthara tše ke karolo ye bohlokwa ya go hlohleletša ikonomi ya go kgathalelana.
tgt: la maziko ayinxalenye ebalulekileyo yoqoqosho lwenkathalo.

src: di thuša go tšwetšapele mekgwa ye batho ba iphedišago ka yona, kudududu basading, gomme se sa thuša go hloma mešomo ditšhabeng tše ntši.
tgt: bazigcina bephila, ingakumbi abasetyhini, nto leyo enegalelo ekudaleni imisebenzi kwiindawo ezininzi zoluntu.

src: nakong ya ge leuba la covid19 le aparela naga, disenthara tša ecd di ile tša amega gampe.
tgt: xa ubhubhane wecovid19 wawuhlasela, amaziko eecd achaphazeleka kakhulu.

src: dise nthara tšeo di tshepetšego ditefong tša dikolo gore di šome di ile tša šitwa ke go lefela bašomedi ba tšona ebile batswadi ba bantši bao ba lahlegetšwego ke mešomo ba ile ba palelwa ke go ngwadiša bana ba bona.
tgt: amaziko axhomekeke kwimali ehlawulwa ngabazali esikolweni ukuze aqhubeke eqhuba akakwazanga ukuhlawula abasebenzi babo kwaye uninzi lwabazali abaphulukene nomsebenzi abakwazanga ukugcina abantwana babo bebhalisile.

src: go rarolla seemo se, mmušo o ile wa hloma se khwama sa ecd sa kimollo le sa tlhomo ya mešomo go thuša disenthara tša ecd tšeo di lahlegetšwego ke meputso ka baka la leuba la covid19 go di kgontšha go kaonafala.
tgt: ukusabela, urhulumente uye waseka ingxowamali yoncedo lwengqesho yeecd ukuze incede amaziko eecd aphulukene nomvuzo ngenxa yobhubhane ukuze akwazi ukubuyela esiqhelweni.

src: go tlabela bana bao e lego badudi ba naga ye ka tsebo le mabokgoni ao ba a hlokago gore ba kgone go atlega bophelong ke maikarabelo ao ka moka ga rena re swanetšego go a šikara magetleng a rena.
tgt: ukulungiselela abemmi bethu abancinane ngezi xhobo abazidingayo ukuze baphumelele ebomini luxanduva ekufuneka siluthwele ngokuhlangeneyo.

src: re swanetše go tšwelapele go dira ka fao re ka kgonang ka gona, bjalo ka mmušo, lefapha la praebete le mekgatlo ya go hlabolla setšhaba, go thekga tlhalefišo ya bomapimpana.
tgt: kufuneka siqhubeke sisenza konke esinako, njengorhulumente, icandelo labucala kunye nemibutho yophuhliso, ukuxhasa uphuhliso lwabantwana abasaqalayo.

src: ka ditirelo tša yona tše bohlokwa tše e di abago, go sa kgathale gore e ruta bana ba rena, e hlokomelela ba tswadi bao ba šomago bana goba e hloma mešomo go bahlomi ba dikgwebo, ecd e nale seabe se segolo kudu gore re kgone go fihlelela tše ntši tša dinepo tša rena tša tlhabollo.
tgt: ngeenkonzo ezininzi ezixabisekileyo ezibonelela ngazo, nokuba kukufu ndisa abantwana bethu, ukubonelela ngokhathalelo labantwana kubazali abasebenzayo okanye ukuvulela amathuba oosomashishini, iecd yenza igalelo elikhu lu ekuphunyezweni kweenjongo zethu ezininzi zophuhliso.

src: ka fao o ka seketšago meetse ka gona more matshediso le ge kgoro ya meetse le tlhwekišo mengwa geng ya go feta e lekile ka maatla go fediša mošomo wo o bego o saletše morago wa go tsentšhetša badudi meetse, mo nageng ya afrika borwa ka bophara malapa, ao mebasepala e kgonnego go a tsentšhetša meetse a fihla go 68%.
tgt: indlela yokulondoloza amanzi more matshediso ukuthembeka koni kezelo lwamanzi ngoomasipala kumakhaya kumzantsi afrika uphela kungama68% kuphela, nangona isebe lezamanzi nogutyulo liqhubekile nokuzama ukuphelisa ukusilela konikezelo lwamanzi kule minyaka idlulileyo.

src: motlatšatona wa meetse le tlhwekišo david mahlobo o bolela gore lebakakgolo la go hlola se ke mananeo kgoparara ao a tšofetšego, go hloka tlhokomelo le tokišo ya kgafetšakgafetša ditlamong tša meetse, le tlemagano ya go fokola magareng ga mananeo a dintlo le diprotšeke tša bjale tša tlhabollo ya mananeo kgoparara.
tgt: usekela mphathiswa wezamanzi nogutyulo udavid mahlobo uthi oku kungenxa yeziseko ezingundoqo ezindala, ukungabikho komsebenzi nokulungiswa kwenkqubo zamanzi, kunye nokungahlangani kakuhle kweenkqubo zolwakhiwo lwezindlu kunye neeprojekthi zophuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo ezikhoyo ngoku.

src: "e tloga e le hlobaboroko ye kgolo gore kabo ya go botega ya meetse e laetša dika tša phuhlamo," a realo.
tgt: "kuyinkxalabo enkulu ukuba ubonelelo loni kezelo lwamanzi oluthe mbekileyo lubonisa iimpawu zokwehla," utshilo.

src: bjalo ka naga ya go hlaelela meetse, afrika borwa ke karolo ya dinaga tše 30 tša komelelo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt: njengelizwe elinqongo pheleyo ngamanzi, umzantsi afrika uphakathi kwamazwe angama30 awomileyo ehlabathini.

src: bontši bja meetse a naga ye a tšwa dupuleng, eupša ka palo moka ye e kgonthišišitšwego ya dipula tšeo di lego fase ga 40% ge di bapetšwa le palomoka ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya lefase ka bophara, naga ye e fela e angwa gampe ke komelelo.
tgt: uninzi lwamanzi elizwe luvela kwimvula, kodwa ngomlinganiselo obhaliweyo wemvula ongaphantsi kwama40% ngaphantsi komyinge wehlabathi wonyaka, ilizwe lihlala lichatshazelwa yimbalela.

src: le ge go le bjalo, kgoro e nale dikeletšo tše o ka di šomišago go seketša meetse.
tgt: nangona kunjalo, isebe linamacebiso malunga nokonga amanzi.

src: go seketša meetse ka legaeng la gago goba ka kgwebong ya gago tswalela pompi ya meetse ge o hlapa sefahlego, o hlapa meno goba o kera ditedu.
tgt: ukonga amanzi kwikhaya okanye kwishishini lakho cima itepu phakathi kokuhlamba ubuso bakho, ukuxukuxa amazinyo akho okanye ukutsheva.

src: go hlapa ka šawara tekano ya metsotso ye mehlano ka letšatši legatong la go hlapela ka pafong go šomiša fela kotara ya meetse ao a šomišwago ge o hlapela ka pafong, gomme o ka seketša dilithara tša go fihla 400 ka beke.
tgt: ukuhlamba ngeshawa imizuzu emihlanu ngosuku endaweni yokubhafa kuya kusebenzisa isinye kwisithathu samanzi okuhlamba ebhafini, ukonga ukuya kutsho kwiilitha ezingama400 ngeveki.

src: go hlapa ka šawara go šomiša dilithara tša go fihla tše 20 tša meetse ka motsotso, mola ge o hlapela ka pafong o ka šomiša dili thara tše magareng ga 80 le 150 tša meetse ka pafo ye tee.
tgt: ukuhlamba ngeshawa kunokusebenzisa ukuya kutsho kwiilitha ezingama20 zamanzi ngomzuzu, kanti ukubhafa kunokusebenzisa phakathi kweelitha ezingama80 kunye ne150 zamanzi kwibhafu nganye.

src: ge o rata go hlapela ka pafong, o seke wa e tlatša ka mariba.
tgt: ukuba ukhetha ukuhlamba, musa ukuyigcwalisa ibhafu.

src: efoga go folaša thwaelete fao go sego maleba.
tgt: kuphephe ukugungxula indlu yangasese ngokungeyomfuneko.

src: lahlela dithišu, dikhunkhwane le dilahlwa tše dingwe ka gare ga setšhelo sa ditlakala e sego ka thwaelete.
tgt: lahla iithishu, izinambuzane kunye nenye inkunkuma emgqomeni kunendlu yangasese.

src: nako le nako ge o folaša, o šomiša meetse a go lekana dilithara tše 12. lokiša thwaelete ya go rothiša meetse go sego bjalo e tla senya meetse a go lekana dilithara tše 100 000 ka ngwaga.
tgt: ngalo lonke ixesha ugungxula indlu yangasese, kusetyenziswa iilitha ezili12 zamanzi.

src: šomiša meetse ao a šomišitšwego – meetse ao a šomileng go tšwa dipafong, metšheneng ya go hlatswa le methopong ye mengwe ya go bolokega go folaša thwaelete.
tgt: lungisa indlu yangasese evuzayo kungenjalo inokumosha ukuya kutsho kwiilitha ezingama 100 000 zamanzi ngonyaka omnye.

src: o seke wa tlatša letamo la boruthelo go feta tekano goba wa le hlwekiša ka go falatša meetse ka moka go feta tekano.
tgt: sebenzisa "amanzi angwevu" — amanzi asetyenzisiweyo asuka kwiibhafu, koomatshini bokuhlamba kunye nezinye iindawo ezikhuselekileyo ukugungxula indlu yakho yangasese.

src: diketlele ga se tša swanela go tlatšwa ka meetse go feta tekano eupša di swanetše go tšhelwa fela meetse ao a lekanego gore o kgone go a šomiša.
tgt: musa ukugcwalisa ngokugqithisileyo okanye ukucoca ngokugqithisileyo idama lakho lokuqubha.

src: se se tla theoša gape le tšhomišo ya gago ya mohlagase.
tgt: iiketile akufuneki zigcwaliswe ukuya kutsho phezulu kodwa ngamanzi anele nje iimfuno zakho.

src: šomiša pakete go hlatswa koloi legatong la go šomiša phaephe.
tgt: oku kuza kunciphisa ityala lakho lombane kananjalo.

src: ge e ba o gapeletšega go šomiša phaephe, diriša hlogwana ya go šašetša meetse yeo o ka kgonang go e tswalela ge o le gare o šašetša koloi ka yona.
tgt: sebenzisa ibhakethi kunokuhlamba imoto yakho ngombhobho.

src: ge o šomiša phaephe o ka diriša meetse a mantši a go fihla dilithara tše 30 ka motsotso.
tgt: ukuba ku funeka usebenzise umbho bho, sebenzisa isitshizi esinokucinywa phakathi kokutshiza imoto.

src: balemi ba swanetše go netefatša gore ba beela kgole difotheladikhu khwane tše nago le mpholo kgole le methopo le meela ya meetse.
tgt: ukusebenzisa umbhobho wesitiya kungasebenzi sa iilitha ezingama30 zamanzi ngomzuzu.

src: batho ba swanetše go bale tlhokomelo ye kgolo mafe long ao ba dulago go ona gore ba se tšhilafatše dinoka goba mariba a tšona.
tgt: abalimi kufuneka baqinisekise ukuba bagcina izitshabalalisi eziyityhe fu kude nemithombo yamanzi kunye nemisinga.

src: go seketša meetse ka tšhengwaneng dula o nošetša dimela tša gago mesong goba mathapama, ge dithemphereitšha di fodile.
tgt: abantu abahlala emapha ndleni kufuneka balumke bangasebenzisi umlambo okanye unxweme lomlambo njengendlu yangasese.

src: nako le nako ge o fufutša mae, o se tšholle meetse ao gomme o a beye gore a fole o tle o nošetše ka ona.
tgt: esitiyeni soloko unkcenkceshela izityalo zakho ngeeyure zasekuseni okanye ngokuhlwa, xa amaqondo obushushu epholile.

src: dimela tša gago di tla godišwa ke menontšha ya go tšwa dikgepetleng tša mae.
tgt: ngalo lonke ixesha ubilisa iqanda, yonga amanzi apholileyo ukunkcenkce shela izityalo zakho zase khaya.

src: meetse a go tšwa marulelong le ona a ka ageletšwa ka ditankeng gore a nošetše ditšhengwana.
tgt: ziza kuzuza kwi zondlo ezikhutshwe kwiqokobhe.

src: šomiša meetse ao a šomišitšwego – meetse ao a šomileng go tšwa dipafong, metšhene ya go hlatswa le methopo ye mengwe ya go bolokega go nosetša tšhengwana ya gago.
tgt: amanzi ophahla nawo angagcinwa ngenzuzo ematankini, ukunkcenkceshela izitiya.

src: vgo hwetša tshedimošo ka botlalo, etela wepsaete ye www.
tgt: sebenzisa "amanzi angwevu"amanzi asetyenzisiweyo asuka kwiibhafu, koomatshini bokuhlamba kunye ne minye imithombo ekhu selekileyo ukunkcenkce shela isitiya sakho.

src: prep e ka kgona go thibela hiv vukuzenzele unnamed ge afrika borwa e tla be e gopola letšatši la lefase la aids ka la 1 manthole mmogo le matšatši a 16 a kgahlanong le dikgaruru tša bong (gbv) go tloga ka la 25 dibatsela go fihla ka la 10 manthole, vuk’uzenzele e lebelela kamano gareng ga gbv le hiv/aids.
tgt: iprep inokuthintela ihiv vukuzenzele unnamed njengoko umzantsi afrika ukhumbula usuku lwehla bathi likagawulayo ngo mhla woku1 kweyomnga kunye neentsuku ezili16 zokulwa ubundlobongela obusekwe kwisini (igbv), ukusuka ngomhla wama25 kweyenkanga ukuya kowe10 kweyomnga, ivuk’uze nzele iphonononga ubudle lwane phakathi kwegbv kunye nehiv/aids.

src: sekhwama sa karabelo sa dikgaruru tša bong le polao ya basadi (gbvf) se nepile go netefatša gore afrika borwa ga e na dipolao tša basadi; bana; le batho ba go wela ka sehlopheng sa batho ba go ratana ka bong botee (lgbtqia+).
tgt: ingxowamali yokusabela ubundlobongela obusekwe kwisini nokubulawa kwa basetyhini (igbvf) izama ukuqinisekisa ukuba umzantsi afrika awunayo igbvf ngakumabhinqa; ebantwaneni; kunye nabasetyhini abathandana nabanye base tyhini (ilesbian), amadoda athandana namanye amadoda (igay), abanesini esibini (ibisexual), abatshintshe isini (itransgender), abathandana nabanye abantu ngokwahlu kana (iintersex), abanesini esingaqondakaliyo (iqueer/questioning), abangakhathale langa sini somntu abathandana naye (iasexual) kunye nabanye (ilgbtqia+).

src: sekhwama se tsebagaditšwe ke mopresidente cyril ramaphosa ka dibokwane 2022 go thekga phethagatšo ya leanotharollo la bosetšhaba go gbvf.
tgt: le ngxowamali yaqalwa ngu mongameli ucyril ramaphosa kweyomdumba wama2021, ukuxhasa ukuphunyezwa kwe sicwangcisoqhinga sesizwe segbvf.

src: go ya le ka websaete ya sekhwama, sekhwama se se bapala karolo e bohlokwa ka go tlišeng phetogo, se itheile go dinyakišišo, ditemošo le thekgo go mekgatlo yeo e lwantšhanago le gbvf.
tgt: ngokutsho kwewebhusayithi yale ngxowamali, idlala indima ebaluleke ka khulu ekwenzeni utshintsho, olusekelwe kuphando, kulwazi kunye nenkxaso ebonakalayo kwimibutho ebandakanyekayo ekulweni igbvf.

src: wo mongwe wa mekgatlo yeo e thekgwago ke sekhwama se ke gugu dlamini foundation ya ka kwazulunatal yeo ka ngwaga wa 2022 e filwego r250 000 ke sekhwama sa kara belo ya gbvf.
tgt: omnye wemibutho exhaswa yile ngxowamali yigugu dlamini foundation ezinze kwazulunatal, nefumene amar250 000 aphuma kwi ngxowamali yegbvf ngo wama2022.

src: molaodiphethiši wa gugu dlamini foundation, mandisa mabaso, o hlomile mokgatlo wo ka 2010 morago ga gore mmagwe – mohu gugu dla mini – a bolawe ka go kgatlwa ka maswika ka 1998 ka durban morago ga go bolela gore o na le hiv .
tgt: umlawuli wesigqeba segugu dlamini foundation, umandisa mabaso, waseka eli ziko ngowama2010 emva kokuba umama wakhe ongasekhoyo ugugu dlamini waxulutywa ngamatye wa bhubha ngowe1998 ethekwini ngenxa yokuchaza isimo sakhe sokuba nehiv .

src: "mokgatlo o ikemišeditše go matlafatša pušo ya selegae go kaonafatša karabelo ya gbvf, e lego sona selo se lego bohlokwa sa go tlo thuša go kgona go laola leuba la hiv ka afrika borwa," gwa realo mabaso.
tgt: "eli ziko lijolise ekomelezeni ulawulo lwasekhaya ukuze kuphuculwe ukuphendulwa kwegbvf, nokubalulekileyo ekufezekiseni ulawulo lo bhubhane wehiv emzantsi afrika," utsho umabaso.

src: "e tlo re thuša gape go fokotša diphetetšo tša hiv , go oketša phihlelelego ya go hwetša tlho komelo gape le go kaonafatša dipoelo tša maphelo bakeng sa basadi le banna bao ba fetetšwego ebile ba amilwego ke hiv/aids," a tlaleletša ka go realo.
tgt: "eli ziko likwajolise ekunci phiseni usuleleko lwehiv/aids, landise ukufikelela ekunyamekelweni kunye nase kuphuculweni kweziphumo zempilo kwabasetyhini kunye nasemadodeni osulelekileyo nabachaphazelekayo yihiv/aids," wongeze watsho.

src: mašeleng ao mokgatlo o a fiwago a thuša basadi le basetsana ba 522 255 le banna le bašemane ba 900 go tšwa mala peng ao a amilwego ke gbv le dikgaruru tša ka malapeng; batho ba go phela ka bogolofadi bao ba tlaišitšwego; le batho ba lgbtqia+, gwa realo mabaso.
tgt: inkxasomali esiyifumana sileli ziko inceda abasetyhini namantombazana angama522 255 kunye namadoda nama khwenkwe angama900 aphuma kwiintsapho ezichatshazelwe yigbv kunye nobundlobongela basekhaya; incede abantu abaxhatshaziweyo abaphila nokhubazeko; kunye noluntu lwelgbt qia+, utshilo umabaso.

src: go ya ka unaids, ka mafelong ao hiv e tletšego kudu, basadi bao e lego batšwasehlabelo ba gbv ba lebagane le kgonagalo ya 50% ya gore ba tsenwe ke hiv .
tgt: ngokutsho kweunaids, kwiindawo ezichaphazeleke kakhulu yihiv , abase tyhini abangamaxhoba egbv bajongana namathuba angangama50% okufumana ihiv .

src: a mangwe a mabaka a se ke go katwa, le banna ba go gana go šomiša dikhondomo.
tgt: ezinye zezizathu zoku kukudlwengulwa kunye nokwala kwamadoda ukuse benzisa iikhondom.

src: naa prep ke eng?
tgt: yintoni iprep?

src: ye nngwe ya ditsela tša go thibela phetetšo ya hiv ke go nwa preexposure prophylaxis (prep), e lego moriana woo o nwewago tšatši ka tšatši ke batho bao ba se nago hiv bao ba lego kotsing ya go fetelwa ka tsela ya thobalano goba go ihlabela ka diokobatši.
tgt: enye yeendlela zokuthintela usuleleko lwehiv kukusebenzisa ipreexposure prophylaxis (iprep), eliyeza elithathwa mihla le ngabantu abangenayo ihiv kodwa abasemngci phekweni omkhulu wokuba bosuleleke yihiv , ngesondo okanye ngokusebenzisa iziyobisi ezitofwayo.

src: ka phato, tona joe phaahla o boletše gore afrika borwa e na le palo ya godimo ya tšhomišo ya prep ka afrika ya subsahara.
tgt: ngeyethupha, umphathiswa ujoe phaahla uthe umzantsi afrika unelona zinga liphezulu lokuqala iprep eselwayo kwiafrika esemazantsi nesahara.

src: o rile mafelo a tlhokomelo ya maphelo a ka afrika borwa a dipersente tše 70 goba a 2 419 ka palo, a akareditše prep ka ditirelong tša ona tša ka mehla.
tgt: uthe ama70%, okanye ama ziko angama2 419 okhathalelo lwempilo asemzantsi afrika adibanisa neprep eselwayo kuluhlu lweenkonzo zabo zesiqhelo.

src: "motho yoo a nwago prep ga a hloke go e nwa bophelo bja gagwe ka moka.
tgt: "umntu osebenzisa iprep akanyanzelekanga ukuba ayithathe ubomi bakhe bonke, unokukhetha ukuyithatha qho xa esemngciphekweni woko sulelwa yihiv .

src: le ge go le bjalo, gore prep e šome ka tshwanelo, e swanetše e nwewe tšatši le lengwe le le lengwe [nakong yeo]," mabaso a netefatša ka go realo.
tgt: nakuba kunjalo, ukuze iprep isebenze, kufuneka ithathwe yonke imihla [ngeli xesha]," uqini sekisa ngelitshoyo umabaso.

src: prep e swanetše e šomišwe le mekgwa ye mengwe ya thibelo e bjalo ka dikhondomo tša banna le tša basadi ka gore prep ga e šireletše motho kgahla nong le malwetši a mangwe a go fetela ka thobalano, gomme ebile ga se thibelapelego.
tgt: kufuneka kwakhona ise tyenziswe kunye nezinye ii ndlela zokuzikhusela, ezifana neekhondom zabasetyhini nezamadoda, kuba iprep ayimkhuseli umntu kwezinye izifo ezosulela ngokwabe lana ngesondo kwaye ayilulo ucwangcisonzala.

src: mabaso o re ka mabakeng ao e lego gore baratani ba nyaka go ba le ngwana, prep e ka kgona go thuša go thibela phetetšo ya hiv go molekani yoo a se nago hiv mmogo le ngwana yo a sa imilwego.
tgt: umabaso uthi kwiimeko apho isibini sifuna ukuba nomntwana, iprep ingance disa ekuthinteleni usuleleko lwehiv kwiqabane elinge nayo ihiv kunye nakusana olungekazalwa.

src: go sa le bjalo, mathomong a ngwaga wo ba setheo sa taolo ya ditšweletšwa tša maphelo sa afrika borwa ba fetišitše tšhomišo ya rini ya setho sa bosadi bjalo ka prep .
tgt: okwangoku, ebutsheni balo nyaka, ugunyaziwe wolawulo lweemveliso zezempilo emzantsi afrika uphumeze ukusetyenziswa kweringi efakwa kwilungu labucala lomntu wasetyhini njengeprep .

src: rini yeo e na le pilisi ya antiretroviral yeo e bitšwago dapivirine, gomme yona e swanetše e fetolwe kgwedi ka kgwedi.
tgt: le ringi inechiza leantiretroviral ekuthiwa yidapivirine kwaye kufuneka itshintshwe rhoqo ngenyanga.

src: go tlaleletša seo, prep ye mpsha, e lego tšhwaana yeo e dulago kgwedi tše pedi ka mmeleng wa motho, e sa emetše gore e fetišwe.
tgt: ukongeza, iprep entsha isitofu esihlala iinyanga ezimbini ilindele ukuvunywa.

src: ge e se no fetišwa, batho ba ka se sa hloka go ikgopotša gore ba nwe pilisi tšatši ka tšatši.
tgt: yakuba ivunyiwe, abantu abasayi kuphinda babe bekhumbula ukusela ipilisi yonke imihla.

src: thobalano yeo e bolokegilego mokgatlo wo o ikemišeditše go fokotša diphetetšo tša hiv ka go tšweletša pele tšhomišo ya dikhondomo le thobalano yeo e bolokegilego.
tgt: ukwabelana ngesondo okukhuselekileyoeli ziko lijolise ekunciphi seni usuleleko lwehiv ngokukhuthaza ukusetye nziswa kweekhondom kunye nokwabelana ngesondo oku khuselekileyo.

src: "re hlohleletša bana le baswa gore ba se tsenele tša thobalano e sa le ka pela go fihlela ba itokišitše go dira dikgetho tša maleba tša go itekanela," gwa realo mabaso.
tgt: "sibongoza abantwana kunye nolutsha ukuba baliba zise ukwabelana ngesondo de babe bakulungele ukwenza izigqibo ezinolwazi nezise mpilweni," utshilo umabaso.

src: "re hlohleletša gape le thobalano yeo e bolokegilego ka go gatelela tšhomišo ya khondomo le go ba le molekano yo tee.
tgt: "sikwakhuthaza ukwabelana ngesondo oku khuselekileyo ngokugxininisa ukusetyenziswa kwekho ndom kunye nokuba neqa bane elinye kuphela ngexesha.

src: seo bommagobana bao ba nago le hiv gomme ba nyantshago ba swanetsego go se tseba vukuzenzele unnamed ge afrika borwa e tla be e dira segopotšo sa letšatši la lefase la aids ka la 1 manthole, kgoro ya maphelo ka kwazulunatal e eleditše bommagobana bao ba nago le hiv gore ba fepe masea a bona ka go a nyantšha feela tekano ya dikgwedi tše tshela.
tgt: yintoni ekufuneka beyazile omama abancancisayo abanehiv vukuzenzele unnamed njengoko umzantsi afrika uqwalasela usuku lwe hlabathi likagawulayo ngomhla woku1 kwe yomnga, isebe lezempi lo kwazulunatal lice bise oomama abanehiv ukuba bacinge ngoku ncancisa kuphela iintsa na zabo kangangeenya nga ezintandathu.

src: go ya ka kgoro, ge eba o mosadi yoo a nyantšhago gomme ebile o na le hiv , go bohlokwa gore o boledišane le mothobamatswalo wa gago wa tša hiv ka mehuta ya go fepa.
tgt: ngokwesebe, ukuba ungumama oncancisayo onehiv , kubalulekile ukuba uxoxe ngeendlela zokuncancisa kunye nomcebisi wakho wehiv .

src: ge e ba o kgetha go nyantšha, netefatša gore o fepa ngwana ka go mo nyantšha feela tekano ya dikgwedi tše tshela tša mathomo.
tgt: ukuba ukhetha ukuncancisa, qiniseka ukuba uyancancisa kuphela kwiinyanga ezinta ndathu zokuqala.

src: diphatišišo di bontšhitše gore go na le kgonagalo e nnyane kudu ya gore ngwana a fetelwe ke hiv go tšwa matutung a letswele ge eba mmagwe a mo fepa ka go mo nyantšha feela.
tgt: uphando lubonise ukuba umntwana unamathuba amancinane kakhulu okufumana ihiv kwibisi lebele ukuba ngaba umama u mncancisa ibele qha.

src: mo dikgweding tšeo o tla bego o imile, le ge o tla be o nyantšha, netefatša gore o šomiša khondomo ge o tsenela tša thobalano gore o thibele diphetetšo tše diswa.
tgt: ngeenyanga okhulelwe ngazo, naxa uncancisa, qiniseka ukuba usebenzisa ikhondom xa usabelana ngesondo ukuthintela naluphi na ulosuleleko olutsha.

src: ge eba o na le mathata afe goba afe a bjalo ka ditlhoko tše bohloko goba matswele a bohloko, netefatša gore o ya kliniking e sa le ka pela go yo hwetša thušo.
tgt: ukuba unazo naziphi na iingxaki ezifana nokuqaqanjelwa ziingono okanye ngamabele, qiniseka ukuba uya ekliniki kwangethuba ukuze ufumane uncedo.

src: kgoro e tloga e gatelela taba ya go fepa ka go nyantšha feela ka ge e thuša ngwana gore a be le mašole a mmele a tiilego, gape le go hlama kgokagano e tiilego gareng ga mma le ngwana.
tgt: isebe likucebisa ngamandla ukuncanciswa kwebele qha kuba kunceda usana lube namajoni omzimba awomeleleyo, kwaye kubekho ubudlelwane obuqinileyo phakathi komama kunye nosana.

src: go nyantšha go fokotša gape le dikotsi tša go tsenwa ke kankere ya letswele.
tgt: ukuncancisa ku kwanciphisa umngcipheko kumama wokuba abe no mhlaza webele.

src: dikakanyo tša maaka le dinnete mabapi le go nyantšha go na le dikakanyo tša maaka tše ntšhi tša mabapi le go nyantšha.
tgt: iintetho ezingeyonyani kunye neziyinyani ngokuncancisazininzi iintetho ezingeyonyani nezayanyaniswa nokunca ncisa, isebe liye lazibhenca ezintetho ngokuphendula le mibuzo ilandelayo ebuzwa rhoqo ngoomama abanehiv kunye nabo bangenayo.

src: kgoro e ile ya phošolla dikakanyo tša maaka tše ka go araba dipotšišo tše latelago tša go botšišwa ka mehla ke bommagobana bao ba nago le hiv mmogo le bao ba se nago nayo.
tgt: umbuzo: ummelwane wam uthe mandifumane iyeza loku coca isisu somntwana wam.

src: naa se se bohlokwa?
tgt: ingaba oku kubalulekile?

src: karabo: matutu a mathomo, ao a tšweletšwago ke dithaka tša maswi morago ga pelego, a hlwekiša ditšhila go tšwa mpeng ya ngwana.
tgt: impendulo: umthubi, lubisi lokuqala lwebele nolukhu tshwa ngamadlala ebele emva kokubeleka, lulo olucoca indle emnyama yokuqala esiswini.

src: ga o hloke meriana go hlwekiša ngwana ka teng ka ge maswi a letswele a hlwekile gomme ebile a kgona go šireletša teng ga ngwana.
tgt: awuyi kudinga nawaphi na amayeza okucoca ngakumbi njengoko ubisi lwebele lucocekile, kwaye ngokwenene lufaka ifula esuswini, lusi khusele kwiintsholongwane.

src: potšišo: matšatšing a se makae a mathomo, ge e ba ke se na matutu a lekanego, naa nka fa ngwana meetse goba maswi a mohuta wo mongwe?
tgt: umbuzo: kwiintsuku ezi mbalwa zokuqala, ukuba andinalo ubisi olwaneleyo, ndingamnika amanzi okanye olunye ubisi?

src: karabo: matutu a mathomo ke sona feela seo ngwana a se hlokago.
tgt: impendulo: umthubi uyiyo yonke into efunwa ngumntwana.

src: o hloka go nyantšha ngwana kgafetšakgafetša gore matutu a mangwe a tšweletšwe – ke ka moo o kgonago go tšweletša matutu a mantšhi ka gona.
tgt: kufuneka nje uncancise umntwana rhoqo ukuze wehlise ngolo hlobo wenza ubisi oluninzi.

src: kgopela mmelegiši go go fa ngwana wa gago seripagare sa iri o sa tšwa go mmelega gore o kgone go mo nyantšha.
tgt: cela umbelekisi ukuba akunike usana lwakho kwisiqingatha sokuqala seyure emva kokubeleka, ukuze ulufake ebeleni.

src: ngwana o tla kgona go ithuta go nyanya ka pela gomme se se tla go thuša gore o dire matutu a mantšhi.
tgt: usana luya kufunda ngokukhawuleza ukuba kuncancwa njani kwaye oku kuya kukunceda wenze ubisi oluninzi.

src: potšišo: ke a nyantšha, efela ngwana ga a khore.
tgt: umbuzo: ndimncancisa ibele, kodwa umntwana akoneli.

src: naa ke hloka go mo nyantšha le maswi a lebotlelo?
tgt: ingaba kufuneka ndimnike nobisi olungumgubo?

src: lesa ngwana a nyanye go fihlela a kgotsofala letsweleng le tee gore a hwetše matutu a moseo.
tgt: nika usana lwakho ixesha elaneleyo lokuncanca de aneliseke kwibele elinye, ukuze uqiniseke ukuba lufumana ola bisi lokugqibela nolufunyanwa ngumntwana ekupheleni kokuncanca.

src: ge ngwana a tšwela pele a nyanya, matutu le ona a tšwela pele go dirwa.
tgt: okukhona usana luncanca, kokukhona usehlisa.

src: potšišo: ngwanaka o phela a nyaka go nyanya; a e ka ba ga ke na matutu a lekanego?
tgt: umbuzo: usana lwam lufuna ukuncanca rhoqo mhlawumbi andinabisi lwaneleyo?

src: karabo: mohlomongwe ngwana o gola ka lebelo, ka fao o hloka matutu a mantšhi.
tgt: impendulo: mhlawumbi usana lakho lukhula ngokukhawuleza, kwaye ludinga ubisi oluninzi.

src: ka go nyantšha kgafetšakgafetša, o ka kgona go dira matutu a mantšhi ao ngwana a a hlokago.
tgt: ngokunca ncisa rhoqo, unokwenza ubisi olwaneleyo kwiimfuno zosana.

src: matutu a ka se ke a fela.
tgt: ubisi aluyi kuphela.

src: lesa ngwana a nyanye nako e teletšana.
tgt: nika usana lakho ixesha elongezelelweyo lokuba luncancise musa ukususa usana ebeleni.

src: ge ngwana a ka thapiša maleiri a go feta a tshela tšatši ka tšatši, a nyantšhwa kgafetšakgafetša (makga a 8 go ya go 12 tšatši ka tšatši), a gola ka digerama tše 500 kgwed i ka kgwedi, gona o tšweletša matutu a lekanego.
tgt: ukuba usana lakho luba namanaphukeni amanzi angaphezu kwesi thandathu yonke imihla, oko kuthetha ukuba wondliwa rhoqo (ubuncinci kanga ngesi8 kuya ku12 yonke imihla), kwaye umntwana utyeba kangangama500g rhoqo ngenyanga, ngoko ke wenza ubisi olwaneleyo.

src: potšišo: naa nka dira eng ge ngwana a phela a lla?
tgt: umbuzo: ukuba umntwana wam ukhala oko, ndenze ntoni?

src: karabo: homotša ngwana wa gago ka go mmea letsweleng kgafetšakgafetša.
tgt: impendulo: thuthuzela usana lwakho ngokulubeka ebeleni.

src: bana ba hloka go ba kgauswi le bo mmabona.
tgt: iintsana kufuneka zisondele koonina.

src: se se tla kgona gala ge bomma le bana ba robala ka phapošing e tee.
tgt: oomama kunye neentsana abasebe nzisa igumbi elinye kuya kukukhuthaza oku.

src: ge eba ngwana wa gago o swerwe ke tlala, o nyorilwe goba o selekegile, go nyanya letswele go tla mo kgotsofatša.
tgt: ukuba usana lwakho lulambile, lunxaniwe okanye lukhathazekile, ukumncancisa ibele kuya kwamnelisa.

src: kgonagalo ke ye nnyane kudu ya gore o ka nyantšha ngwana go feta tekano ge a phela ka maswi a letswele feela.
tgt: akuna kwenzeka ukuba ulincancise ngokugqithisileyo usana lwakho xa ulunika ubisi lwebele kuphela.

src: potšišo: naa go lokile go fa ngwana dino tše dingwe?
tgt: umbuzo: ingaba kulungile ukuliseza ezinye iziselo?

src: go fa ngwana dino tše dingwe go ka dira gore ngwana a be le kgona galo e ntšhi ya go tsenwa ke malwetši a bjalo ka letšhologo le nyumonia.
tgt: impendulo: hayi, ukongeza ezinye iziselo kuthetha ukuba usana lakho luse mngciphekweni wokufumana izifo ezinjengorhudo kunye nokukrala kwemiphunga (inyumoniya).

src: se sengwe gape, ge eba ngwana o nwa dino tše dingwe, a ka se nyanye gantšhi, gomme le wena o ka se kgone go dira matutu a lekanego.
tgt: kwakhona, ukuba usana lufumana ezinye iziselo, aluyi kuncanca rhoqo kwaye awuzukwazi ukwe hlisa.

src: potšišo: naa ngwana ga a hloke meetse ge go fiša?
tgt: umbuzo: aluwadingi na amanzi usana lwam xa ku shushu?

src: dipalopalo tša mešomo di laetša gore ikonomi ya rena e leetong la go tsoga vukuzenzele unnamed mo me ngwageng e se mekae yeo e fetilego, maafrika borwa a ile a swanelwa ke go tlwaela kgolo ya ikonomi ya go nanya mmogo le koketšego ya tlhokego ya mešomo.
tgt: amanani emisebenzi abonisa ukuba uqoqosho lwethu lusendleleni yokubuyela kwimo entle vukuzenzele unnamed kule minyaka imbalwa idlu lileyo, abemi bomzantsi afrika kuye kwafuneka ukuba bajongane nokukhula okucothayo kunye nokunyuka kwentswelangqesho.

src: se se ile sa gakatšwa kudu ke leuba la masetlapelo la covid19, di kgaruru tša mosegamanye 2021 le, mathomong a ngwaga wo, mafula a šoro ka dika rolong tša kwazulunatal, kapa bohlabela le leboa bodikela.
tgt: oku kuye kwenziwa kubi ngakumbi ngubhubhane, lilinge lovukelombuso nge yekhala wama2021, kunye nezikhukhula ezinamandla kwiindawo zakwazulunatal ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, empuma koloni kunye nasemntla ntshona.

src: gareng ga tše ka moka, mathata a mohlagase a oketšegile, gomme a hlola tshenyo go ikonomi le ma tshwenyego go malapa le dikgwebo.
tgt: phakathi kwayo yonke le nto, ingxaki yombane iye yabonakala inkulu, iba ngela umonakalo kuqoqosho kunye nobunzima kuma khaya nakumashishini.

src: efela, le ka gare ga dihlotlo tše tše kgolo tše, setšhaba sa borena mmogo le ikonomi ba itaeditše gore ba a kgo tlelela, gomme go na le ditaetšo tša gore ikonomi ya rena e bontšha dika tša go kgahliša tša go tsoga.
tgt: nangona kunjalo, pha kathi kwale mingeni yoyikekayo, uluntu kunye noqoqosho lwethu lubonakalise ukomelela kwakhona ngokukhawuleza.

src: dipalopalo tša gabjale, kudu tša mešomo, di re fa kholofelo.
tgt: kwaye kukhangeleka ingathi uqo qosho lwethu lubonakalisa iimpawu ezikhuthazayo zokubuyela kwimo entle.

src: ba statistics south africa ba laeditše gore go bile le phokotšego ya tlhokego ya mešomo ka kotareng ya bobedi ya 2021. dipalopalo tša bona di bontšhitše gore – e lego seo se lego bohlokwa – palo ya batho bao ba šomago e oketšegile go tloga go dimilione tše 14.5 ka kotareng ya bone ya 2021 go ya go dimilione tše 15.5 ka kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022. ye ke koketšego ya go kgahliša ya mešomo yeo e lego gore e a hlokwa nakong ya seripa sa mathomo sa ngwaga wo.
tgt: iinkcukachamanani zomzantsi afrika zire khode ukwehla kwezinga lentswelangqesho kwikota yesibini yama2021.

src: mešomo ye e ile ya hlolwa kudu ka makaleng a bjalo ka ditirelo tša setšhaba le leago, dikgwebišano, ditšhelete le, kudukudu, tša boagi.
